h4.p: [21] karu.naasiitalahadaya.m ^a^P1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ ^a^M1.0001^ea^, pa~n~naapajjotavihatamohatama.m.
[22] sanaraamaralokagaru.m, vande ^b^sugata.m^eb^ gativimutta.m..
[21] buddhopi buddhabhaava.m, bhaavetvaa ceva sacchikatvaa ca.
[22] ya.m upagato gatamala.m, vande tamanuttara.m ^b^dhamma.m..^eb^
[21] sugatassa orasaana.m, puttaana.m maarasenamathanaana.m.
[22] a.t.thannampi samuuha.m, sirasaa vande ^b^ariyasa"ngha.m..^eb^
[21] iti ^a^V1.0002^ea^ me pasannamatino, ratanattayavandanaamaya.m pu~n~na.m.
[22] ya.m suvihatantaraayo, hutvaa tassaanubhaavena..
[21] ^b^diighassa^eb^ diighasutta"nkitassa, nipu.nassa ^b^aagamavarassa.^eb^
[22] buddhaanubuddhasa.mva.n.nitassa, saddhaavahagu.nassa..
[21] atthappakaasanattha.m, ^b^a.t.thakathaa^eb^ aadito vasisatehi.
[22] pa~ncahi yaa sa"ngiitaa, anusa"ngiitaa ca pacchaapi..
[21] siiha.ladiipa.m pana aabhataatha, vasinaa mahaamahindena.
[22] .thapitaa siiha.labhaasaaya, diipavaasiinamatthaaya..
[21] apanetvaana ^a^M1.0002^ea^ tatoha.m, siiha.labhaasa.m manorama.m bhaasa.m.
[22] tantinayaanucchavika.m, aaropento vigatadosa.m..
[21] samaya.m avilomento, theraana.m therava.msapadiipaana.m.
[22] sunipu.navinicchayaana.m, mahaavihaare nivaasiina.m..
[21] hitvaa punappunaagatamattha.m, attha.m pakaasayissaami.
[22] sujanassa ca tu.t.thattha.m, cira.t.thitattha~nca dhammassa..
[21] siilakathaa dhutadhammaa, kamma.t.thaanaani ceva sabbaani.
[22] cariyaavidhaanasahito, jhaanasamaapattivitthaaro..
[21] sabbaa ca abhi~n~naayo, pa~n~naasa"nkalananicchayo ceva.
[22] khandhadhaataayatanindriyaani, ariyaani ceva cattaari..
[21] saccaani ^a^P1.0002^ea^ paccayaakaaradesanaa, suparisuddhanipu.nanayaa.
[22] avimuttatantimaggaa, vipassanaa bhaavanaa ceva..
[21] iti ^a^V1.0003^ea^ pana sabba.m yasmaa, ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ mayaa suparisuddha.m.
[22] vutta.m tasmaa bhiyyo, na ta.m idha vicaarayissaami..
[21] ``majjhe ^b^visuddhimaggo,^eb^ esa catunnampi aagamaana~nhi.
[22] .thatvaa pakaasayissati, tattha yathaa bhaasita.m attha.m''..
[21] icceva kato tasmaa, tampi gahetvaana saddhimetaaya.
[22] a.t.thakathaaya vijaanatha, diighaagamanissita.m atthanti..

[03] tattha ^b^diighaagamo^eb^ naama siilakkhandhavaggo, mahaavaggo, paathikavaggoti vaggato tivaggo hoti; suttato catutti.msasuttasa"ngaho. tassa vaggesu ^b^siilakkhandhavaggo^eb^ aadi, suttesu ^b^brahmajaala.m.^eb^ brahmajaalassaapi ``eva.m ^a^M1.0003^ea^ me suta''ntiaadika.m aayasmataa aanandena pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale vutta.m nidaanamaadi.

[03] pa.thamamahaasa"ngiiti naama cesaa ki~ncaapi vinayapi.take tantimaaruu.lhaa, nidaanakosallattha.m pana idhaapi eva.m veditabbaa. dhammacakkappavattana~nhi aadi.m katvaa yaava subhaddaparibbaajakavinayanaa katabuddhakicce, kusinaaraaya.m upavattane mallaana.m saalavane yamakasaalaanamantare visaakhapu.n.namadivase paccuusasamaye anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbute bhagavati lokanaathe, bhagavato dhaatubhaajanadivase sannipatitaana.m sattanna.m bhikkhusatasahassaana.m sa"nghatthero aayasmaa mahaakassapo sattaahaparinibbute bhagavati subhaddena vu.d.dhapabbajitena -- ``ala.m, aavuso, maa socittha, maa paridevittha, sumuttaa maya.m tena mahaasama.nena, upaddutaa ca homa -- `ida.m vo kappati, ida.m vo na kappatii'ti, idaani pana maya.m ya.m icchissaama, ta.m karissaama, ya.m na icchissaama na ta.m karissaamaa''ti (cuu.lava0 437) vuttavacanamanussaranto, iidisassa ca sa"nghasannipaatassa puna dullabhabhaava.m ma~n~namaano, ``.thaana.m ^a^V1.0004^ea^ kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m paapabhikkhuu `atiitasatthuka.m paavacana'nti ma~n~namaanaa ^a^P1.0003^ea^ pakkha.m labhitvaa nacirasseva saddhamma.m antaradhaapeyyu.m, yaava ca dhammavinayo ti.t.thati, taava anatiitasatthukameva paavacana.m hoti. vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa --
[02] `yo vo, aananda, mayaa dhammo ca vinayo ca desito pa~n~natto, so vo mamaccayena satthaa'ti (dii0 ni0 2.216).
[03] `ya.mnuunaaha.m dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyya.m, yathayida.m saasana.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m'.
[03] ya~ncaaha.m bhagavataa --
[02] `dhaaressasi pana me tva.m, kassapa, saa.naani pa.msukuulaani nibbasanaanii'ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.154) vatvaa ciivare saadhaara.naparibhogena.

[02] `aha.m, bhikkhave, yaavadeva aaka"nkhaami vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m ^a^M1.0004^ea^ jhaana.m upasampajja viharaami; kassapopi, bhikkhave, yaavadeva, aaka"nkhati vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharatii'ti (sa.m0 ni0 2.152).

[03] evamaadinaa nayena navaanupubbavihaaracha.labhi~n~naappabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanaa samasama.t.thapanena ca anuggahito, tathaa aakaase paa.ni.m caaletvaa alaggacittataaya ceva candopamapa.tipadaaya ca pasa.msito, tassa kima~n~na.m aa.na.nya.m bhavissati. nanu ma.m bhagavaa raajaa viya sakakavacaissariyaanuppadaanena attano kulava.msappati.t.thaapaka.m putta.m `saddhammava.msappati.t.thaapako me aya.m bhavissatii'ti, mantvaa iminaa asaadhaara.nena anuggahena anuggahesi, imaaya ca u.laaraaya pasa.msaaya pasa.msiiti cintayanto dhammavinayasa"ngaayanattha.m bhikkhuuna.m ussaaha.m janesi. yathaaha --

[02] ``atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhikkhuu aamantesi -- `ekamidaaha.m, aavuso, samaya.m ^a^V1.0005^ea^ paavaaya kusinaara.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehii''ti (cuu.lava0 437) sabba.m ^b^subhaddaka.n.da.m^eb^ vitthaarato veditabba.m. attha.m panassa mahaaparinibbaanaavasaane aagata.t.thaaneyeva kathayissaama.
[07] tato para.m aaha --

[02] ``handa maya.m, aavuso, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca ^a^P1.0004^ea^ sa"ngaayaama, pure adhammo dippati, dhammo pa.tibaahiyyati; pure avinayo dippati, vinayo pa.tibaahiyyati; pure adhammavaadino balavanto honti, dhammavaadino dubbalaa honti, pure avinayavaadino balavanto honti, vinayavaadino dubbalaa hontii''ti (cuu.lava0 437).

[01] bhikkhuu aaha.msu -- ``tena hi, bhante, thero bhikkhuu uccinatuu''ti. thero pana sakalanava"ngasatthusaasanapariyattidhare puthujjanasotaapannasakadaagaamianaagaami sukkhavipassaka khii.naasavabhikkhuu anekasate, anekasahasse ca ^a^M1.0005^ea^ vajjetvaa tipi.takasabbapariyattippabhedadhare pa.tisambhidaappatte mahaanubhaave yebhuyyena bhagavato etadagga.m aaropite tevijjaadibhede khii.naasavabhikkhuuyeva ekuunapa~ncasate pariggahesi. ye sandhaaya ida.m vutta.m -- ``atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo ekenuunaani pa~nca arahantasataani uccinii''ti (cuu.lava0 437).

[03] kissa pana thero ekenuunamakaasiiti? aayasmato aanandattherassa okaasakara.nattha.m. tenahaayasmataa sahaapi, vinaapi, na sakkaa dhammasa"ngiiti.m kaatu.m. so haayasmaa sekkho sakara.niiyo, tasmaa sahaapi na sakkaa. yasmaa panassa ki~nci dasabaladesita.m suttageyyaadika.m appaccakkha.m naama natthi. yathaaha --
[21] ``dvaasiiti buddhato ga.nhi.m, dve sahassaani bhikkhuto.
[22] caturaasiiti sahassaani, ye me dhammaa pavattino''ti.. (theragaa0 1027).
[03] tasmaa vinaapi na sakkaa.

[03] yadi eva.m sekkhopi samaano dhammasa"ngiitiyaa bahukaarattaa therena uccinitabbo assa, atha kasmaa na uccinitoti? paruupavaadavivajjanato. thero hi aayasmante aanande ativiya ^a^V1.0006^ea^ vissattho ahosi, tathaa hi na.m sirasmi.m palitesu jaatesupi `na vaaya.m kumaarako mattama~n~naasii'ti, (sa.m0 ni0 2.154) kumaarakavaadena ovadati. sakyakulappasuto caayasmaa tathaagatassa bhaataa cuu.lapituputto. tattha keci bhikkhuu chandaagamana.m viya ma~n~namaanaa -- ``bahuu asekkhapa.tisambhidaappatte bhikkhuu .thapetvaa ^a^P1.0005^ea^ aananda.m sekkhapa.tisambhidaappatta.m thero uccinii''ti upavadeyyu.m. ta.m paruupavaada.m parivajjento, `aananda.m vinaa dhammasa"ngiiti.m na sakkaa kaatu.m, bhikkhuuna.myeva na.m anumatiyaa gahessaamii'ti na uccini.
[03] atha sayameva bhikkhuu aanandassatthaaya thera.m yaaci.msu. yathaaha --

[02] ``bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m mahaakassapa.m etadavocu.m -- `aya.m, bhante, aayasmaa aanando ki~ncaapi sekkho abhabbo chandaa dosaa mohaa bhayaa agati.m gantu.m, bahu caanena bhagavato santike dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto, tena hi, bhante, thero aayasmantampi ^a^M1.0006^ea^ aananda.m uccinatuu'ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmantampi aananda.m uccinii''ti (cuu.lava0 437).
[03] eva.m bhikkhuuna.m anumatiyaa uccinitena tenaayasmataa saddhi.m pa~ncatherasataani ahesu.m.

[03] atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``kattha nu kho maya.m dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaamaa''ti? atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- ``raajagaha.m kho mahaagocara.m pahuutasenaasana.m, ya.mnuuna maya.m raajagahe vassa.m vasantaa dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaama, na a~n~ne bhikkhuu raajagahe vassa.m upagaccheyyu''nti (cuu.lava0 437).

[03] kasmaa pana nesa.m etadahosi? ``ida.m pana amhaaka.m thaavarakamma.m, koci visabhaagapuggalo sa"nghamajjha.m pavisitvaa ukko.teyyaa''ti. athaayasmaa mahaakassapo ~nattidutiyena kammena saavesi --

[02] ``su.naatu ^a^V1.0007^ea^ me, aavuso sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m sa"ngho imaani pa~nca bhikkhusataani sammanneyya raajagahe vassa.m vasantaani dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m, na a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi raajagahe vassa.m vasitabba''nti. esaa ~natti.

[02] ``su.naatu me, aavuso sa"ngho, sa"ngho imaani pa~ncabhikkhusataani sammanna''ti `raajagahe vassa.m vasantaani dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m, na a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi raajagahe vassa.m vasitabbanti. yassaayasmato khamati imesa.m pa~ncanna.m ^a^P1.0006^ea^ bhikkhusataana.m sammuti' raajagahe vassa.m vasantaana.m dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m, na a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi raajagahe vassa.m vasitabbanti, so tu.nhassa; yassa nakkhamati, so bhaaseyya.

[02] ``sammataani sa"nghena imaani pa~ncabhikkhusataani raajagahe vassa.m vasantaani dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayitu.m, na a~n~nehi bhikkhuuhi raajagahe vassa.m vasitabbanti, khamati sa"nghassa, tasmaa tu.nhii, evameta.m dhaarayaamii''ti (cuu.lava0 438).

[03] aya.m ^a^M1.0007^ea^ pana kammavaacaa tathaagatassa parinibbaanato ekaviisatime divase kataa. bhagavaa hi visaakhapu.n.namaaya.m paccuusasamaye parinibbuto, athassa sattaaha.m suva.n.nava.n.na.m sariira.m gandhamaalaadiihi puujayi.msu. eva.m sattaaha.m saadhukii.lanadivasaa naama ahesu.m. tato sattaaha.m citakaaya agginaa jhaayi, sattaaha.m sattipa~njara.m katvaa sandhaagaarasaalaaya.m dhaatupuuja.m kari.msuuti, ekaviisati divasaa gataa. je.t.thamuulasukkapakkhapa~ncamiya.myeva dhaatuyo bhaajayi.msu. etasmi.m dhaatubhaajanadivase sannipatitassa mahaabhikkhusa"nghassa subhaddena vu.d.dhapabbajitena kata.m anaacaara.m aarocetvaa vuttanayeneva ca bhikkhuu uccinitvaa aya.m kammavaacaa kataa.

[03] ima~nca pana kammavaaca.m katvaa thero bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, idaani tumhaaka.m cattaaliisa divasaa okaaso kato, tato para.m `aya.m naama no palibodho atthii'ti, vattu.m na labbhaa, tasmaa etthantare yassa rogapalibodho vaa aacariyupajjhaayapalibodho vaa maataapitupalibodho vaa atthi, patta.m vaa pana pacitabba.m, ciivara.m vaa kaatabba.m, so ta.m palibodha.m chinditvaa ta.m kara.niiya.m karotuu''ti.

[03] eva~nca pana vatvaa thero attano pa~ncasataaya parisaaya parivuto raajagaha.m gato. a~n~nepi mahaatheraa attano attano parivaare gahetvaa sokasallasamappita.m mahaajana.m assaasetukaamaa ta.m ta.m disa.m pakkantaa. pu.n.natthero pana sattasatabhikkhuparivaaro `tathaagatassa parinibbaana.t.thaana.m aagataagata.m mahaajana.m assaasessaamii'ti kusinaaraaya.myeva a.t.thaasi.

[03] aayasmaa aanando yathaa pubbe aparinibbutassa, eva.m parinibbutassaapi bhagavato sayameva ^a^V1.0008^ea^ pattaciivaramaadaaya pa~ncahi bhikkhusatehi saddhi.m yena saavatthi tena caarika.m pakkaami. gacchato gacchato panassa parivaaraa bhikkhuu ga.nanapatha.m viitivattaa. tenaayasmataa gatagata.t.thaane mahaaparidevo ahosi ^a^P1.0007^ea^. anupubbena pana saavatthimanuppatte there saavatthivaasino manussaa ``thero kira aagato''ti sutvaa gandhamaalaadihatthaa paccuggantvaa -- ``bhante, aananda, pubbe bhagavataa saddhi.m aagacchatha, ajja kuhi.m bhagavanta.m ^a^M1.0008^ea^ .thapetvaa aagatatthaa''tiaadiini vadamaanaa parodi.msu. buddhassa bhagavato parinibbaanadivase viya mahaaparidevo ahosi.

[03] tatra suda.m aayasmaa aanando aniccataadipa.tisa.myuttaaya dhammiyaakathaaya ta.m mahaajana.m sa~n~naapetvaa jetavana.m pavisitvaa dasabalena vasitagandhaku.ti.m vanditvaa dvaara.m vivaritvaa ma~ncapii.tha.m niiharitvaa pappho.tetvaa gandhaku.ti.m sammajjitvaa milaatamaalaakacavara.m cha.d.detvaa ma~ncapii.tha.m atiharitvaa puna yathaa.thaane .thapetvaa bhagavato .thitakaale kara.niiya.m vatta.m sabbamakaasi. kurumaano ca nhaanako.t.thakasammajjanaudakupa.t.thaapanaadikaalesu gandhaku.ti.m vanditvaa -- ``nanu bhagavaa, aya.m tumhaaka.m nhaanakaalo, aya.m dhammadesanaakaalo, aya.m bhikkhuuna.m ovaadadaanakaalo, aya.m siihaseyyakappanakaalo, aya.m mukhadhovanakaalo''tiaadinaa nayena paridevamaanova akaasi, yathaa ta.m bhagavato gu.naga.naamatarasa~n~nutaaya pati.t.thitapemo ceva akhii.naasavo ca anekesu ca jaatisatasahassesu a~n~nama~n~nassuupakaarasa~njanitacittamaddavo. tamena.m a~n~nataraa devataa -- ``bhante, aananda, tumhe eva.m paridevamaanaa katha.m a~n~ne assaasessathaa''ti sa.mvejesi. so tassaa vacanena sa.mviggahadayo santhambhitvaa tathaagatassa parinibbaanato pabhuti .thaananisajjabahulattaa ussannadhaatuka.m kaaya.m samassaasetu.m dutiyadivase khiiravirecana.m pivitvaa vihaareyeva nisiidi. ya.m sandhaaya subhena maa.navena pahita.m maa.navaka.m etadavoca --
[02] ``akaalo, kho maa.navaka, atthi me ajja bhesajjamattaa piitaa, appeva naama svepi upasa"nkameyyaamaa''ti (dii0 ni0 1.447).
[03] dutiyadivase cetakattherena pacchaasama.nena gantvaa subhena maa.navena pu.t.tho imasmi.m diighanikaaye ^b^subhasutta.m^eb^ naama dasama.m sutta.m abhaasi.

[03] atha aanandatthero jetavanamahaavihaare kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m ^a^P1.0008^ea^ kaaraapetvaa upaka.t.thaaya vassuupanaayikaaya bhikkhusa"ngha.m ohaaya raajagaha.m gato ^a^M1.0009^ea^ tathaa a~n~nepi dhammasa"ngaahakaa bhikkhuuti. eva~nhi gate, te sandhaaya ca ida.m vutta.m -- ``atha kho theraa bhikkhuu raajagaha.m agama.msu, dhamma~nca vinaya~nca ^a^V1.0009^ea^ sa"ngaayitu''nti (cuu.lava0 438). te aasa.lhiipu.n.namaaya.m uposatha.m katvaa paa.tipadadivase sannipatitvaa vassa.m upagacchi.msu.

[03] tena kho pana samayena raajagaha.m parivaaretvaa a.t.thaarasa mahaavihaaraa honti, te sabbepi cha.d.ditapatitauklaapaa ahesu.m. bhagavato hi parinibbaane sabbepi bhikkhuu attano attano pattaciivaramaadaaya vihaare ca parive.ne ca cha.d.detvaa agama.msu. tattha katikavatta.m kurumaanaa theraa bhagavato vacanapuujanattha.m titthiyavaadaparimocanattha~nca -- `pa.thama.m maasa.m kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m karomaa'ti cintesu.m. titthiyaa hi eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaa satthari .thiteyeva vihaare pa.tijaggi.msu, parinibbute cha.d.desu.m, kulaana.m mahaadhanapariccaago vinassatii''ti. tesa~nca vaadaparimocanattha.m cintesunti vutta.m hoti. eva.m cintayitvaa ca pana katikavatta.m kari.msu. ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m --

[02] ``atha kho theraana.m bhikkhuuna.m etadahosi -- bhagavataa, kho aavuso, kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m va.n.nita.m, handa maya.m, aavuso, pa.thama.m maasa.m kha.n.daphullappa.tisa"nkhara.na.m karoma, majjhima.m maasa.m sannipatitvaa dhamma~nca vinaya~nca sa"ngaayissaamaa''ti (cuu.lava0 438).

[03] te dutiyadivase gantvaa raajadvaare a.t.tha.msu. raajaa aagantvaa vanditvaa -- ``ki.m bhante, aagatatthaa''ti attanaa kattabbakicca.m pucchi. theraa a.t.thaarasa mahaavihaarapa.tisa"nkhara.natthaaya hatthakamma.m pa.tivedesu.m. raajaa hatthakammakaarake manusse adaasi. theraa pa.thama.m maasa.m sabbavihaare pa.tisa"nkharaapetvaa ra~n~no aarocesu.m -- ``ni.t.thita.m, mahaaraaja, vihaarapa.tisa"nkhara.na.m, idaani dhammavinayasa"ngaha.m karomaa''ti. ``saadhu bhante visa.t.thaa karotha, mayha.m aa.naacakka.m ^a^P1.0009^ea^, tumhaaka~nca dhammacakka.m hotu, aa.naapetha, bhante, ki.m karomii''ti. ``sa"ngaha.m karontaana.m bhikkhuuna.m sannisajja.t.thaana.m mahaaraajaa''ti. ``kattha karomi, bhante''ti? ``vebhaarapabbatapasse sattapa.n.ni guhaadvaare kaatu.m yutta.m mahaaraajaa''ti. ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho raajaa ajaatasattu vissakammunaa ^a^M1.0010^ea^ nimmitasadisa.m suvibhattabhittithambhasopaana.m, naanaavidhamaalaakammalataakammavicitta.m, abhibhavantamiva raajabhavanavibhuuti.m, avahasantamiva devavimaanasiri.m, siriyaa niketanamiva ekanipaatatitthamiva ca devamanussanayanaviha.mgaana.m, lokaraama.neyyakamiva sampi.n.dita.m da.t.thabbasaarama.n.da.m ma.n.dapa.m kaaraapetvaa vividhakusumadaamolambakaviniggalantacaaruvitaana.m naanaaratanavicittama.niko.t.timatalamiva ca, na.m naanaapupphuupahaaravicittasuparini.t.thitabhuumikamma.m brahmavimaanasadisa.m ala"nkaritvaa, tasmi.m mahaama.n.dape ^a^V1.0010^ea^ pa~ncasataana.m bhikkhuuna.m anagghaani pa~nca kappiyapaccatthara.nasataani pa~n~napetvaa, dakkhi.nabhaaga.m nissaaya uttaraabhimukha.m theraasana.m, ma.n.dapamajjhe puratthaabhimukha.m buddhassa bhagavato aasanaaraha.m dhammaasana.m pa~n~napetvaa, dantakhacita.m biijani~ncettha .thapetvaa, bhikkhusa"nghassa aarocaapesi -- ``ni.t.thita.m, bhante, mama kicca''nti.

[03] tasmi~nca pana divase ekacce bhikkhuu aayasmanta.m aananda.m sandhaaya evamaaha.msu -- ``imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe eko bhikkhu vissagandha.m vaayanto vicaratii''ti. thero ta.m sutvaa imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe a~n~no vissagandha.m vaayanto vicara.nakabhikkhu naama natthi. addhaa ete ma.m sandhaaya vadantiiti sa.mvega.m aapajji. ekacce na.m aaha.msuyeva -- ``sve aavuso, aananda, sannipaato, tva~nca sekkho sakara.niiyo, tena te na yutta.m sannipaata.m gantu.m, appamatto hohii''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando -- `sve sannipaato, na kho meta.m patiruupa.m yvaaha.m sekkho samaano sannipaata.m gaccheyya'nti, bahudeva ratti.m kaayagataaya satiyaa viitinaametvaa ^a^P1.0010^ea^ rattiyaa paccuusasamaye ca"nkamaa orohitvaa vihaara.m pavisitvaa ``nipajjissaamii''ti kaaya.m aavajjesi, dve paadaa bhuumito muttaa, apatta~nca siisa.m bimbohana.m, etasmi.m antare anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimucci. aya~nhi aayasmaa ca"nkamena bahi viitinaametvaa visesa.m nibbattetu.m asakkonto cintesi -- ``nanu ma.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- `katapu~n~nosi tva.m, aananda, padhaanamanuyu~nja, khippa.m hohisi anaasavo'ti (dii0 ni0 2.207). buddhaana~nca kathaadoso naama natthi, mama pana accaaraddha.m viiriya.m, tena me citta.m uddhaccaaya sa.mvattati. handaaha.m viiriyasamata.m yojemii''ti, ca"nkamaa orohitvaa paadadhovana.t.thaane .thatvaa paade dhovitvaa ^a^M1.0011^ea^ vihaara.m pavisitvaa ma~ncake nisiiditvaa, ``thoka.m vissamissaamii''ti kaaya.m ma~ncake apanaamesi. dve paadaa bhuumito muttaa, siisa.m bimbohanamappatta.m, etasmi.m antare anupaadaaya aasavehi citta.m vimutta.m, catuiriyaapathavirahita.m therassa arahatta.m. tena ``imasmi.m saasane anipanno anisinno a.t.thito aca"nkamanto ko bhikkhu arahatta.m patto''ti vutte ``aanandatthero''ti vattu.m va.t.tati.

[03] atha theraa bhikkhuu dutiyadivase pa~ncamiya.m kaa.lapakkhassa katabhattakiccaa pattaciivara.m pa.tisaametvaa dhammasabhaaya.m sannipati.msu. atha kho aayasmaa aanando arahaa samaano sannipaata.m agamaasi. katha.m agamaasi? ``idaanimhi sannipaatamajjha.m pavisanaaraho''ti ha.t.thatu.t.thacitto eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa bandhanaa muttataalapakka.m viya, pa.n.dukambale nikkhittajaatima.ni viya, vigatavalaahake nabhe samuggatapu.n.nacando viya, baalaatapasamphassavikasitare.nupi~njaragabbha.m paduma.m viya ^a^V1.0011^ea^ ca, parisuddhena pariyodaatena sappabhena sassiriikena ca mukhavarena attano arahattappatti.m aarocayamaano viya agamaasi. atha na.m disvaa aayasmato mahaakassapassa etadahosi -- ``sobhati vata bho arahattappatto aanando, sace satthaa dhareyya, addhaa ajjaanandassa saadhukaara.m dadeyya, handa ^a^P1.0011^ea^, daanissaaha.m satthaaraa daatabba.m saadhukaara.m dadaamii''ti, tikkhattu.m saadhukaaramadaasi.

[03] majjhimabhaa.nakaa pana vadanti -- ``aanandatthero attano arahattappatti.m ~naapetukaamo bhikkhuuhi saddhi.m naagato, bhikkhuu yathaavu.d.dha.m attano attano pattaasane nisiidantaa aanandattherassa aasana.m .thapetvaa nisinnaa. tattha keci evamaaha.msu -- `eta.m aasana.m kassaa'ti? `aanandassaa'ti. `aanando pana kuhi.m gato'ti? tasmi.m samaye thero cintesi -- `idaani mayha.m gamanakaalo'ti. tato attano aanubhaava.m dassento pathaviya.m nimujjitvaa attano aasaneyeva attaana.m dassesii''ti, aakaasena gantvaa nisiidiitipi eke. yathaa vaa tathaa vaa hotu. sabbathaapi ta.m disvaa aayasmato mahaakassapassa saadhukaaradaana.m yuttameva.

[03] eva.m aagate pana tasmi.m aayasmante mahaakassapatthero bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso, ki.m pa.thama.m sa"ngaayaama, dhamma.m vaa vinaya.m vaa''ti? bhikkhuu ^a^M1.0012^ea^ aaha.msu -- ``bhante, mahaakassapa, ^b^vinayo naama^eb^ buddhasaasanassa aayu. vinaye .thite saasana.m .thita.m naama hoti. tasmaa pa.thama.m vinaya.m sa"ngaayaamaa''ti. ``ka.m dhura.m katvaa''ti? ``aayasmanta.m upaali''nti. ``ki.m aanando nappahotii''ti? ``no nappahoti''. api ca kho pana sammaasambuddho dharamaanoyeva vinayapariyatti.m nissaaya aayasmanta.m upaali.m etadagge .thapesi -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m vinayadharaana.m yadida.m upaalii''ti (a0 ni0 1.228). `tasmaa upaalitthera.m pucchitvaa vinaya.m sa"ngaayaamaa'ti.
[03] tato thero vinaya.m pucchanatthaaya attanaava attaana.m sammanni. upaalittheropi vissajjanatthaaya sammanni. tatraaya.m paa.li -- atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[21] ``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m,
[22] aha.m upaali.m vinaya.m puccheyya''nti..
[07] aayasmaapi upaali sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[21] ``su.naatu ^a^V1.0012^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m,
[22] aha.m aayasmataa mahaakassapena vinaya.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.. (cuu.lava0 439).

[03] eva.m attaana.m sammannitvaa aayasmaa upaali u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m ^a^P1.0012^ea^ katvaa there bhikkhuu vanditvaa dhammaasane nisiidi dantakhacita.m biijani.m gahetvaa, tato mahaakassapatthero theraasane nisiiditvaa aayasmanta.m upaali.m vinaya.m pucchi. ``pa.thama.m aavuso, upaali, paaraajika.m kattha pa~n~natta''nti? ``vesaaliya.m, bhante''ti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti? ``sudinna.m kalandaputta.m aarabbhaa''ti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``methunadhamme''ti.

[03] ``atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m upaali.m pa.thamassa paaraajikassa vatthumpi pucchi, nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, pa~n~nattimpi pucchi, anupa~n~nattimpi pucchi, aapattimpi pucchi, anaapattimpi pucchi'' (cuu.lava0 439). pu.t.tho pu.t.tho aayasmaa upaali vissajjesi.

[03] ki.m panettha pa.thamapaaraajike ki~nci apanetabba.m vaa pakkhipitabba.m vaa atthi natthiiti? apanetabba.m natthi. buddhassa hi bhagavato bhaasite apanetabba.m naama natthi. na hi tathaagataa ekabya~njanampi niratthaka.m vadanti. saavakaana.m pana devataana.m ^a^M1.0013^ea^ vaa bhaasite apanetabbampi hoti, ta.m dhammasa"ngaahakattheraa apanayi.msu. pakkhipitabba.m pana sabbatthaapi atthi, tasmaa ya.m yattha pakkhipitu.m yutta.m, ta.m pakkhipi.msuyeva. ki.m pana tanti? `tena samayenaa'ti vaa, `tena kho pana samayenaa'ti vaa, `atha khoti vaa', `eva.m vutteti' vaa, `etadavocaa'ti vaa, evamaadika.m sambandhavacanamatta.m. eva.m pakkhipitabbayutta.m pakkhipitvaa pana -- ``ida.m pa.thamapaaraajika''nti .thapesu.m. pa.thamapaaraajike sa"ngahamaaruu.lhe pa~nca arahantasataani sa"ngaha.m aaropitanayeneva ga.nasajjhaayamaka.msu -- ``tena samayena buddho bhagavaa vera~njaaya.m viharatii''ti. tesa.m sajjhaayaaraddhakaaleyeva saadhukaara.m dadamaanaa viya mahaapathavii udakapariyanta.m katvaa akampittha.

[03] eteneva nayena sesaani tii.ni paaraajikaani sa"ngaha.m aaropetvaa ``ida.m paaraajikaka.n.da''nti .thapesu.m. terasa sa"nghaadisesaani ``terasaka''nti .thapesu.m. dve sikkhaapadaani ``aniyataanii''ti .thapesu.m. ti.msa sikkhaapadaani ``nissaggiyaani paacittiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m ^a^P1.0013^ea^. dvenavuti sikkhaapadaani ``paacittiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. cattaari sikkhaapadaani ``paa.tidesaniiyaanii''ti ^a^V1.0013^ea^ .thapesu.m. pa~ncasattati sikkhaapadaani ``sekhiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. satta dhamme ``adhikara.nasamathaa''ti .thapesu.m. eva.m sattaviisaadhikaani dve sikkhaapadasataani ``mahaavibha"ngo''ti kittetvaa .thapesu.m. mahaavibha"ngaavasaanepi purimanayeneva mahaapathavii akampittha.

[03] tato bhikkhuniivibha"nge a.t.tha sikkhaapadaani ``paaraajikaka.n.da.m naama ida''nti .thapesu.m. sattarasa sikkhaapadaani ``sattarasaka''nti .thapesu.m. ti.msa sikkhaapadaani ``nissaggiyaani paacittiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. chasa.t.thisatasikkhaapadaani ``paacittiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. a.t.tha sikkhaapadaani ``paa.tidesaniiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. pa~ncasattati sikkhaapadaani ``sekhiyaanii''ti .thapesu.m. satta dhamme ``adhikara.nasamathaa''ti .thapesu.m. eva.m tii.ni sikkhaapadasataani cattaari ca sikkhaapadaani ``bhikkhuniivibha"ngo''ti kittetvaa -- ``aya.m ubhato vibha"ngo naama catusa.t.thibhaa.navaaro''ti .thapesu.m. ubhatovibha"ngaavasaanepi vuttanayeneva mahaapathavikampo ahosi.

[03] etenevupaayena asiitibhaa.navaaraparimaa.na.m khandhaka.m, pa~ncaviisatibhaa.navaaraparimaa.na.m parivaara~nca sa"ngaha.m aaropetvaa ``ida.m ^b^vinayapi.taka.m^eb^ naamaa''ti .thapesu.m ^a^M1.0014^ea^. vinayapi.takaavasaanepi vuttanayeneva mahaapathavikampo ahosi. ta.m aayasmanta.m upaali.m pa.ticchaapesu.m -- ``aavuso, ima.m tuyha.m nissitake vaacehii''ti. vinayapi.takasa"ngahaavasaane upaalitthero dantakhacita.m biijani.m nikkhipitvaa dhammaasanaa orohitvaa there bhikkhuu vanditvaa attano pattaasane nisiidi.

[03] vinaya.m sa"ngaayitvaa dhamma.m sa"ngaayitukaamo aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhikkhuu pucchi -- ``dhamma.m sa"ngaayante hi ka.m puggala.m dhura.m katvaa dhammo sa"ngaayitabbo''ti? bhikkhuu -- ``aanandatthera.m dhura.m katvaa''ti aaha.msu.
[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[21] ``su.naatu me, aavuso, sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa ^a^P1.0014^ea^ pattakalla.m,
[22] aha.m aananda.m dhamma.m puccheyya''nti.
[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando sa"ngha.m ~naapesi --
[21] ``su.naatu ^a^V1.0014^ea^ me, bhante, sa"ngho, yadi sa"nghassa pattakalla.m,
[22] aha.m aayasmataa mahaakassapena dhamma.m pu.t.tho vissajjeyya''nti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa aanando u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m ciivara.m katvaa there bhikkhuu vanditvaa dhammaasane nisiidi dantakhacita.m biijani.m gahetvaa. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo bhikkhuu pucchi -- ``katara.m, aavuso, pi.taka.m pa.thama.m sa"ngaayaamaa''ti? ``suttantapi.taka.m, bhante''ti. ``suttantapi.take catasso sa"ngiitiyo, taasu pa.thama.m katara.m sa"ngiiti''nti? ``diighasa"ngiiti.m, bhante''ti. ``diighasa"ngiitiya.m catuti.msa suttaani, tayo vaggaa, tesu pa.thama.m katara.m vagga''nti? ``siilakkhandhavagga.m, bhante''ti. ``siilakkhandhavagge terasa suttantaa, tesu pa.thama.m katara.m sutta''nti? ``brahmajaalasutta.m naama bhante, tividhasiilaala"nkata.m, naanaavidhamicchaajiivakuha lapanaadividdha.msana.m, dvaasa.t.thidi.t.thijaalavinive.thana.m, dasasahassilokadhaatukampana.m, ta.m pa.thama.m sa"ngaayaamaa''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca, ``brahmajaala.m, aavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti? ``antaraa ca, bhante, raajagaha.m antaraa ca naa.landa.m raajaagaarake ambala.t.thikaaya''nti. ``ka.m aarabbhaa''ti ^a^M1.0015^ea^? ``suppiya~nca paribbaajaka.m, brahmadatta~nca maa.nava''nti. ``kismi.m vatthusmi''nti? ``va.n.naava.n.ne''ti. atha kho aayasmaa mahaakassapo aayasmanta.m aananda.m brahmajaalassa nidaanampi pucchi, puggalampi pucchi, vatthumpi pucchi (cuu.lava0 440). aayasmaa aanando vissajjesi. vissajjanaavasaane pa~nca arahantasataani ga.nasajjhaayamaka.msu. vuttanayeneva ca pathavikampo ahosi.

[03] eva.m brahmajaala.m sa"ngaayitvaa tato para.m ``saama~n~naphala.m, panaavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''ntiaadinaa nayena pucchaavissajjanaanukkamena saddhi.m brahmajaalena sabbepi terasa suttante sa"ngaayitvaa -- ``aya.m siilakkhandhavaggo naamaa''ti kittetvaa .thapesu.m.

[03] tadanantara.m mahaavagga.m, tadanantara.m paathikavagganti, eva.m tivaggasa"ngaha.m catuti.msasuttapa.tima.n.dita.m ^a^P1.0015^ea^ catusa.t.thibhaa.navaaraparimaa.na.m tanti.m sa"ngaayitvaa ``aya.m ^b^diighanikaayo^eb^ naamaa''ti vatvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m pa.ticchaapesu.m -- ``aavuso, ima.m tuyha.m nissitake vaacehii''ti.

[03] tato ^a^V1.0015^ea^ anantara.m asiitibhaa.navaaraparimaa.na.m ^b^majjhimanikaaya.m^eb^ sa"ngaayitvaa dhammasenaapatisaariputtattherassa nissitake pa.ticchaapesu.m -- ``ima.m tumhe pariharathaa''ti.
[03] tato anantara.m satabhaa.navaaraparimaa.na.m ^b^sa.myuttanikaaya.m^eb^ sa"ngaayitvaa mahaakassapatthera.m pa.ticchaapesu.m -- ``bhante, ima.m tumhaaka.m nissitake vaacethaa''ti.
[03] tato anantara.m viisatibhaa.navaarasataparimaa.na.m ^b^a"nguttaranikaaya.m^eb^ sa"ngaayitvaa anuruddhatthera.m pa.ticchaapesu.m -- ``ima.m tumhaaka.m nissitake vaacethaa''ti.

[03] tato anantara.m dhammasa"ngahavibha"ngadhaatukathaapuggalapa~n~nattikathaavatthuyamakapa.t.thaana.m abhidhammoti vuccati. eva.m sa.mva.n.nita.m sukhuma~naa.nagocara.m tanti.m sa"ngaayitvaa -- ``ida.m ^b^abhidhammapi.taka.m^eb^ naamaa''ti vatvaa pa~nca arahantasataani sajjhaayamaka.msu. vuttanayeneva pathavikampo ahosiiti.

[03] tato para.m jaataka.m, niddeso, pa.tisambhidaamaggo, apadaana.m, suttanipaato, khuddakapaa.tho, dhammapada.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, vimaanavatthu, petavatthu, theragaathaa ^a^M1.0016^ea^, theriigaathaati ima.m tanti.m sa"ngaayitvaa ^b^``khuddakagantho^eb^ naamaaya''nti ca vatvaa ``abhidhammapi.takasmi.myeva sa"ngaha.m aaropayi.msuu''ti diighabhaa.nakaa vadanti. majjhimabhaa.nakaa pana ``cariyaapi.takabuddhava.msehi saddhi.m sabbampeta.m khuddakagantha.m naama suttantapi.take pariyaapanna''nti vadanti.

[03] evameta.m sabbampi buddhavacana.m rasavasena ekavidha.m, dhammavinayavasena duvidha.m, pa.thamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividha.m. tathaa pi.takavasena. nikaayavasena pa~ncavidha.m, a"ngavasena navavidha.m, dhammakkhandhavasena caturaasiitisahassavidhanti veditabba.m.

[03] katha.m ^b^rasavasena ekavidha.m?^eb^ ya~nhi bhagavataa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhitvaa yaava anupaadisesaaya ^a^P1.0016^ea^ nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati, etthantare pa~ncacattaaliisavassaani devamanussanaagayakkhaadayo anusaasantena vaa paccavekkhantena vaa vutta.m, sabba.m ta.m ekarasa.m vimuttirasameva hoti. eva.m rasavasena ekavidha.m.

[03] katha.m ^b^dhammavinayavasena duvidha.m?^eb^ sabbameva ceta.m dhammo ceva vinayo caati sa"nkhya.m gacchati. tattha vinayapi.taka.m vinayo, avasesa.m buddhavacana.m dhammo. tenevaaha ``yannuuna maya.m dhamma~nca ^a^V1.0016^ea^ vinaya~nca sa"ngaayeyyaamaa''ti (cuu.lava0 437). ``aha.m upaali.m vinaya.m puccheyya.m, aananda.m dhamma.m puccheyya''nti ca. eva.m dhammavinayavasena duvidha.m.
[03] katha.m ^b^pa.thamamajjhimapacchimavasena tividha.m?^eb^ sabbameva hida.m pa.thamabuddhavacana.m, majjhimabuddhavacana.m, pacchimabuddhavacananti tippabheda.m hoti. tattha --
[21] ``anekajaatisa.msaara.m, sandhaavissa.m anibbisa.m.
[27] gahakaara.m gavesanto, dukkhaa jaati punappuna.m..
[26] gahakaaraka di.t.thosi, puna geha.m na kaahasi.
[27] sabbaa te phaasukaa bhaggaa, gahakuu.ta.m visa"nkhata.m.
[22] visa"nkhaaragata.m citta.m, ta.nhaana.m khayamajjhagaa''ti.. (dha0 pa0 153-54).

[03] ida.m pa.thamabuddhavacana.m. keci ``yadaa have paatubhavanti dhammaa''ti (mahaava0 1) khandhake udaanagaatha.m vadanti. esaa pana paa.tipadadivase sabba~n~nubhaavappattassa somanassamaya~naa.nena paccayaakaara.m paccavekkhantassa uppannaa udaanagaathaati veditabbaa.

[03] ya.m ^a^M1.0017^ea^ pana parinibbaanakaale abhaasi -- ``handa daani, bhikkhave, aamantayaami vo, vayadhammaa sa"nkhaaraa, appamaadena sampaadethaa''ti (dii0 ni0 2.218) ida.m pacchimabuddhavacana.m. ubhinnamantare ya.m vutta.m, eta.m majjhimabuddhavacana.m naama. eva.m pa.thamamajjhimapacchimabuddhavacanavasena tividha.m.

[03] katha.m ^b^pi.takavasena tividha.m?^eb^ sabbampi ceta.m vinayapi.taka.m suttantapi.taka.m abhidhammapi.takanti tippabhedameva ^a^P1.0017^ea^ hoti. tattha pa.thamasa"ngiitiya.m sa"ngiita~nca asa"ngiita~nca sabbampi samodhaanetvaa ubhayaani paatimokkhaani, dve vibha"ngaa, dvaaviisati khandhakaa, so.lasaparivaaraati -- ida.m ^b^vinayapi.taka.m^eb^ naama. brahmajaalaadicatutti.msasuttasa"ngaho diighanikaayo, muulapariyaayasuttaadidiya.d.dhasatadvesuttasa"ngaho majjhimanikaayo, oghatara.nasuttaadisattasuttasahassasattasatadvaasa.t.thisuttasa"ngaho sa.myuttanikaayo, cittapariyaadaanasuttaadinavasuttasahassapa~ncasatasattapa~n~naasasuttasa"ngaho a"nguttaranikaayo, khuddakapaa.tha-dhammapada-udaana-itivuttaka-suttanipaata-vimaanavatthu-petavatthu-theragaathaa-theriigaathaa-jaataka-niddesa-pa.tisambhidaamagga-apadaana-buddhava.msa-cariyaapi.takavasena pannarasappabhedo khuddakanikaayoti ^a^V1.0017^ea^ ida.m ^b^suttantapi.taka.m^eb^ naama. dhammasa"ngaho, vibha"ngo, dhaatukathaa, puggalapa~n~natti, kathaavatthu, yamaka.m, pa.t.thaananti -- ida.m ^b^abhidhammapi.taka.m^eb^ naama. tattha --
[21] ``vividhavisesanayattaa, vinayanato ceva kaayavaacaana.m.
[22] vinayatthaviduuhi aya.m, vinayo vinayoti akkhaato''..

[03] vividhaa hi ettha pa~ncavidhapaatimokkhuddesapaaraajikaadi satta aapattikkhandhamaatikaa vibha"ngaadippabhedaa nayaa. visesabhuutaa ca da.lhiikammasithilakara.nappayojanaa anupa~n~nattinayaa. kaayikavaacasikaajjhaacaaranisedhanato cesa kaaya.m vaaca~nca vineti, tasmaa vividhanayattaa visesanayattaa kaayavaacaana.m vinayanato ceva vinayoti akkhaato. tenetametassa vacanatthakosallattha.m vutta.m --
[21] ``vividhavisesanayattaa, vinayanato ceva kaayavaacaana.m.
[22] vinayatthaviduuhi aya.m, vinayo vinayoti akkhaato''ti..
[03] itara.m ^a^M1.0018^ea^ pana --
[21] ``atthaana.m suucanato suvuttato, savanatotha suudanato.
[22] suttaa.naa suttasabhaagato ca, suttanti akkhaata.m..

[03] ta~nhi attatthaparatthaadibhede atthe suuceti. suvuttaa cettha atthaa, veneyyajjhaasayaanulomena vuttattaa. savati ceta.m atthe sassamiva phala.m, pasavatiiti vutta.m hoti. suudati ceta.m dhenu viya khiira.m, paggharaapetiiti vutta.m hoti. su.t.thu ^a^P1.0018^ea^ ca ne taayati, rakkhatiiti vutta.m hoti. suttasabhaaga~nceta.m, yathaa hi tacchakaana.m sutta.m pamaa.na.m hoti, evametampi vi~n~nuuna.m. yathaa ca suttena sa"ngahitaani pupphaani na vikiriiyanti, na viddha.msiiyanti, evameva tena sa"ngahitaa atthaa. tenetametassa vacanatthakosallattha.m vutta.m --
[21] ``atthaana.m suucanato, suvuttato savanatotha suudanato.
[22] suttaa.naa suttasabhaagato ca, suttanti akkhaata''nti..
[03] itaro ^a^V1.0018^ea^ pana --
[21] ``ya.m ettha vu.d.dhimanto, salakkha.naa puujitaa paricchinnaa.
[22] vuttaadhikaa ca dhammaa, abhidhammo tena akkhaato''..

[03] aya~nhi abhisaddo vu.d.dhilakkha.napuujitaparicchinnaadhikesu dissati. tathaa hesa ``baa.lhaa me dukkhaa vedanaa abhikkamanti, no pa.tikkamantii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 3.389) vu.d.dhiya.m aagato. ``yaa taa rattiyo abhi~n~naataa abhilakkhitaa''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.49) salakkha.ne. ``raajaabhiraajaa manujindo''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.399) puujite. ``pa.tibalo vinetu.m abhidhamme abhivinaye''tiaadiisu (mahaava0 85) paricchinne. a~n~nama~n~nasa"nkaravirahite dhamme ca vinaye caati vutta.m hoti. ``abhikkantena va.n.nenaa''tiaadiisu (vi0 va0 819) adhike.

[03] ettha ca ``ruupuupapattiyaa magga.m bhaaveti'' (dha0 sa0 251), ``mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharatii''tiaadinaa (vibha0 642) nayena vu.d.dhimantopi dhammaa vuttaa. ``ruupaaramma.na.m vaa saddaaramma.na.m vaa''tiaadinaa (dha0 sa0 1) nayena aaramma.naadiihi lakkha.niiyattaa ^a^M1.0019^ea^ salakkha.naapi. ``sekkhaa dhammaa, asekkhaa dhammaa, lokuttaraa dhammaa''tiaadinaa (dha0 sa0 tikamaatikaa 11, dukamaatikaa 12) nayena puujitaapi, puujaarahaati adhippaayo. ``phasso hoti, vedanaa hotii''tiaadinaa (dha0 sa0 1) nayena sabhaavaparicchinnattaa paricchinnaapi. ``mahaggataa dhammaa, appamaa.naa dhammaa (dha0 sa0 tikamaatikaa 11), anuttaraa dhammaa''tiaadinaa (dha0 sa0 dukamaatikaa 11) nayena adhikaapi dhammaa vuttaa. tenetametassa vacanatthakosallattha.m vutta.m --
[21] ``ya.m ettha vu.d.dhimanto, salakkha.naa puujitaa paricchinnaa.
[22] vuttaadhikaa ca dhammaa, abhidhammo tena akkhaato''ti..
[07] ya.m panettha avisi.t.tha.m, ta.m --
[21] ``pi.taka.m pi.takatthaviduu, pariyattibbhaajanatthato aahu.
[22] tena samodhaanetvaa, tayopi vinayaadayo ~neyyaa''..

[03] pariyattipi ^a^V1.0019^ea^ hi ``maa pi.takasampadaanenaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 3.66) pi.takanti vuccati. ``atha puriso aagaccheyya kudaalapi.takamaadaayaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 3.70) ya.m ki~nci bhaajanampi. tasmaa `pi.taka.m pi.takatthaviduu pariyattibhaajanatthato aahu.

[03] idaani ^b^`tena samodhaanetvaa^eb^ ^a^P1.0019^ea^ ^b^tayopi vinayaadayo ~neyyaa'^eb^ti, tena eva.m duvidhatthena pi.takasaddena saha samaasa.m katvaa vinayo ca so pi.taka~nca pariyattibhaavato, tassa tassa atthassa bhaajanato caati vinayapi.taka.m, yathaavutteneva nayena suttanta~nca ta.m pi.taka~ncaati suttantapi.taka.m, abhidhammo ca so pi.taka~ncaati abhidhammapi.takanti. evamete tayopi vinayaadayo ~neyyaa.
[03] eva.m ~natvaa ca punapi tesuyeva pi.takesu naanappakaarakosallattha.m --
[21] ``desanaasaasanakathaabheda.m tesu yathaaraha.m.
[27] sikkhaappahaanagambhiirabhaava~nca paridiipaye..
[26] pariyattibheda.m sampatti.m, vipatti~ncaapi ya.m yahi.m.
[22] paapu.naati yathaa bhikkhu, tampi sabba.m vibhaavaye''..

[03] tatraaya.m paridiipanaa vibhaavanaa ca. etaani hi tii.ni pi.takaani yathaakkama.m aa.naavohaaraparamatthadesanaa, yathaaparaadhayathaanulomayathaadhammasaasanaani, sa.mvaraasa.mvaradi.t.thivinive.thananaamaruupaparicchedakathaati ca vuccanti. ettha ^a^M1.0020^ea^ hi vinayapi.taka.m aa.naarahena bhagavataa aa.naabaahullato desitattaa ^b^aa.naadesanaa,^eb^ suttantapi.taka.m vohaarakusalena bhagavataa vohaarabaahullato desitattaa ^b^vohaaradesanaa,^eb^ abhidhammapi.taka.m paramatthakusalena bhagavataa paramatthabaahullato desitattaa ^b^paramatthadesanaa^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] tathaa pa.thama.m -- `ye te pacuraaparaadhaa sattaa, te yathaaparaadha.m ettha saasitaa'ti ^b^yathaaparaadhasaasana.m,^eb^ dutiya.m -- `anekajjhaasayaanusayacariyaadhimuttikaa sattaa yathaanuloma.m ettha saasitaa'ti ^b^yathaanulomasaasana.m,^eb^ tatiya.m -- `dhammapu~njamatte ``aha.m mamaa''ti sa~n~nino sattaa yathaadhamma.m ettha saasitaa'ti ^b^yathaadhammasaasana^eb^nti vuccati.

[03] tathaa pa.thama.m -- ajjhaacaarapa.tipakkhabhuuto sa.mvaraasa.mvaro ettha kathitoti ^b^sa.mvaraasa.mvarakathaa.^eb^ sa.mvaraasa.mvaroti ^a^V1.0020^ea^ khuddako ceva mahanto ca sa.mvaro, kammaakamma.m viya, phalaaphala.m viya ca, dutiya.m -- ``dvaasa.t.thidi.t.thipa.tipakkhabhuutaa di.t.thivinive.thanaa ettha kathitaa''ti ^b^di.t.thivinive.thanakathaa,^eb^ tatiya.m -- ``raagaadipa.tipakkhabhuuto naamaruupaparicchedo ettha kathito''ti ^b^naamaruupaparicchedakathaa^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] tiisupi cetesu tisso sikkhaa, tii.ni pahaanaani, catubbidho ca gambhiirabhaavo veditabbo. tathaa hi vinayapi.take visesena ^b^adhisiilasikkhaa^eb^ vuttaa, suttantapi.take ^b^adhicittasikkhaa,^eb^ abhidhammapi.take ^b^adhipa~n~naasikkhaa.^eb^

[03] vinayapi.take ca ^b^viitikkamappahaana.m^eb^ ^a^P1.0020^ea^, kilesaana.m viitikkamapa.tipakkhattaa siilassa. suttantapi.take ^b^pariyu.t.thaanappahaana.m,^eb^ pariyu.t.thaanapa.tipakkhattaa samaadhissa. abhidhammapi.take ^b^anusayappahaana.m,^eb^ anusayapa.tipakkhattaa pa~n~naaya. pa.thame ca ^b^tada"ngappahaana.m,^eb^ itaresu ^b^vikkhambhanasamucchedappahaanaani.^eb^ pa.thame ca duccaritasa.mkilesappahaana.m, itaresu ^b^ta.nhaadi.t.thisa.mkilesappahaana.m.^eb^

[03] ekamekasmi~ncettha catubbidhopi dhammatthadesanaa pa.tivedhagambhiirabhaavo veditabbo. tattha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti tanti. ^b^attho^eb^ti tassaayeva attho. ^b^desanaa^eb^ti tassaa manasaa vavatthaapitaaya tantiyaa desanaa. ^b^pa.tivedho^eb^ti tantiyaa tantiatthassa ca yathaabhuutaavabodho. tiisupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanaapa.tivedhaa. yasmaa sasaadiihi viya mahaasamuddo ^a^M1.0021^ea^ mandabuddhiihi dukkhogaa.lhaa alabbhaneyyapati.t.thaa ca, tasmaa gambhiiraa. eva.m ekamekasmi.m ettha catubbidhopi gambhiirabhaavo veditabbo.

[03] aparo nayo, ^b^dhammo^eb^ti hetu. vutta~nheta.m -- ``hetumhi ~naa.na.m dhammapa.tisambhidaa''ti. ^b^attho^eb^ti hetuphala.m, vutta~nheta.m -- ``hetuphale ~naa.na.m atthapa.tisambhidaa''ti (vibha0 720). ^b^desanaa^eb^ti pa~n~natti, yathaa dhamma.m dhammaabhilaapoti adhippaayo. anulomapa.tilomasa"nkhepavitthaaraadivasena vaa kathana.m. ^b^pa.tivedho^eb^ti abhisamayo, so ca lokiyalokuttaro visayato asammohato ca, atthaanuruupa.m dhammesu, dhammaanuruupa.m atthesu, pa~n~nattipathaanuruupa.m pa~n~nattiisu avabodho. tesa.m tesa.m vaa tattha tattha vuttadhammaana.m pa.tivijjhitabbo salakkha.nasa"nkhaato avipariitasabhaavo.

[03] idaani ^a^V1.0021^ea^ yasmaa etesu pi.takesu ya.m ya.m dhammajaata.m vaa atthajaata.m vaa, yaa caaya.m yathaa yathaa ~naapetabbo attho sotuuna.m ~naa.nassa abhimukho hoti, tathaa tathaa tadatthajotikaa desanaa, yo cettha avipariitaavabodhasa"nkhaato pa.tivedho, tesa.m tesa.m vaa dhammaana.m pa.tivijjhitabbo salakkha.nasa"nkhaato avipariitasabhaavo. sabbampeta.m anupacitakusalasambhaarehi duppa~n~nehi sasaadiihi viya mahaasamuddo dukkhogaa.lha.m alabbhaneyyapati.t.tha~nca, tasmaa gambhiira.m. evampi ekamekasmi.m ettha catubbidhopi gambhiirabhaavo veditabbo.
[03] ettaavataa ca --
[21] ``desanaasaasanakathaa, bheda.m tesu yathaaraha.m.
[22] sikkhaappahaanagambhiira, bhaava~nca paridiipaye''ti ^a^P1.0021^ea^ --
[03] aya.m gaathaa vuttatthaava hoti.
[21] ``pariyattibheda.m sampatti.m, vipatti~ncaapi ya.m yahi.m.
[22] paapu.naati yathaa bhikkhu, tampi sabba.m vibhaavaye''ti --
[03] ettha pana tiisu pi.takesu tividho pariyattibhedo da.t.thabbo. tisso hi pariyattiyo -- alagadduupamaa, nissara.natthaa, bha.n.daagaarikapariyattiiti.

[03] tattha yaa duggahitaa, upaarambhaadihetu pariyaapu.taa, aya.m ^b^alagadduupamaa.^eb^ ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso alagaddatthiko alagaddagavesii ^a^M1.0022^ea^ alagaddapariyesana.m caramaano, so passeyya mahanta.m alagadda.m, tamena.m bhoge vaa na"ngu.t.the vaa ga.nheyya, tassa so alagaddo pa.tiparivattitvaa hatthe vaa baahaaya.m vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa a"ngapacca"nge .da.mseyya, so tato nidaana.m mara.na.m vaa nigaccheyya, mara.namatta.m vaa dukkha.m. ta.m kissa hetu? duggahitattaa, bhikkhave, alagaddassa. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacce moghapurisaa dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, sutta.m...pe0... vedalla.m, te ta.m dhamma.m pariyaapu.nitvaa tesa.m dhammaana.m pa~n~naaya attha.m na upaparikkhanti, tesa.m te dhammaa pa~n~naaya attha.m anupaparikkhata.m na nijjhaana.m khamanti, te upaarambhaanisa.msaa ceva dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msaa ca, yassa catthaaya dhamma.m pariyaapu.nanti, ta~ncassa attha.m ^a^V1.0022^ea^ naanubhonti, tesa.m te dhammaa duggahitaa diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? duggahitattaa, bhikkhave, dhammaana''nti (ma0 ni0 1.238).

[03] yaa pana suggahitaa siilakkhandhaadipaaripuuri.myeva aaka"nkhamaanena pariyaapu.taa, na upaarambhaadihetu, aya.m ^b^nissara.natthaa.^eb^ ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m -- ``tesa.m te dhammaa suggahitaa diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattanti. ta.m kissa hetu? suggahitattaa, bhikkhave, dhammaana''nti (ma0 ni0 1.239).

[03] ya.m pana pari~n~naatakkhandho pahiinakileso bhaavitamaggo pa.tividdhaakuppo sacchikatanirodho khii.naasavo kevala.m pave.niipaalanatthaaya va.msaanurakkha.natthaaya pariyaapu.naati, aya.m ^b^bha.n.daagaarikapariyattii^eb^ti.

[03] vinaye pana suppa.tipanno bhikkhu siilasampada.m nissaaya tisso vijjaa paapu.naati, taasa.myeva ca tattha pabhedavacanato. sutte suppa.tipanno samaadhisampada.m nissaaya cha abhi~n~naa paapu.naati, taasa.myeva ca tattha pabhedavacanato. abhidhamme suppa.tipanno pa~n~naasampada.m ^a^P1.0022^ea^ nissaaya catasso pa.tisambhidaa paapu.naati, taasa~nca tattheva pabhedavacanato, evametesu suppa.tipanno yathaakkamena ima.m vijjaattayacha.labhi~n~naacatuppa.tisambhidaabheda.m sampatti.m paapu.naati.

[03] vinaye pana duppa.tipanno anu~n~naatasukhasamphassaatthara.napaavura.naadiphassasaama~n~nato pa.tikkhittesu upaadinnakaphassaadiisu anavajjasa~n~nii hoti. vuttampi ^a^M1.0023^ea^ heta.m -- ``tathaaha.m bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaami, yathaa ye me antaraayikaa dhammaa antaraayikaa vuttaa bhagavataa, te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa''ti (ma0 ni0 1.234). tato dussiilabhaava.m paapu.naati. sutte duppa.tipanno -- ``cattaaro me, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.5) adhippaaya.m ajaananto duggahita.m ga.nhaati, ya.m sandhaaya vutta.m -- ``attanaa duggahitena amhe ceva abbhaacikkhati, attaana~nca kha.nati, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti (ma0 ni0 1.236). tato micchaadi.t.thita.m paapu.naati. abhidhamme duppa.tipanno dhammacinta.m atidhaavanto acinteyyaanipi cinteti. tato cittakkhepa.m paapu.naati, vutta~nheta.m -- ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, acinteyyaani, na cintetabbaani, yaani cintento ummaadassa vighaatassa bhaagii assaa''ti (a0 ni0 4.77). evametesu duppa.tipanno yathaakkamena ima.m dussiilabhaava micchaadi.t.thitaa cittakkhepabheda.m vipatti.m paapu.naatii''ti.
[03] ettaavataa ^a^V1.0023^ea^ ca --
[21] ``pariyattibheda.m sampatti.m, vipatti~ncaapi ya.m yahi.m.
[22] paapu.naati yathaa bhikkhu, tampi sabba.m vibhaavaye''ti --
[03] ayampi gaathaa vuttatthaava hoti. eva.m naanappakaarato pi.takaani ~natvaa tesa.m vaseneta.m buddhavacana.m tividhanti ~naatabba.m.

[03] katha.m nikaayavasena pa~ncavidha.m? sabbameva ceta.m diighanikaayo, majjhimanikaayo, sa.myuttanikaayo, a"nguttaranikaayo, khuddakanikaayoti pa~ncappabheda.m hoti. tattha katamo ^b^diighanikaayo?^eb^ tivaggasa"ngahaani brahmajaalaadiini catutti.msa suttaani.
[21] ``catutti.mseva suttantaa, tivaggo yassa sa"ngaho.
[22] esa diighanikaayoti, pa.thamo anulomiko''ti..

[03] kasmaa ^a^P1.0023^ea^ panesa diighanikaayoti vuccati? diighappamaa.naana.m suttaana.m samuuhato nivaasato ca. samuuhanivaasaa hi nikaayoti vuccanti. ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekanikaayampi samanupassaami eva.m citta.m, yathayida.m, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0024^ea^, tiracchaanagataa paa.naa'' (sa.m0 ni0 2.100). po.nikanikaayo cikkhallikanikaayoti evamaadiini cettha saadhakaani saasanato lokato ca. eva.m sesaanampi nikaayabhaave vacanattho veditabbo.
[03] katamo ^b^majjhimanikaayo?^eb^ majjhimappamaa.naani pa~ncadasavaggasa"ngahaani muulapariyaayasuttaadiini diya.d.dhasata.m dve ca suttaani.
[21] ``diya.d.dhasatasuttantaa, dve ca suttaani yattha so.
[22] nikaayo majjhimo pa~nca, dasavaggapariggaho''ti..
[03] katamo ^b^sa.myuttanikaayo?^eb^ devataasa.myuttaadivasena kathitaani oghatara.naadiini satta suttasahassaani satta ca suttasataani dvaasa.t.thi ca suttaani.
[21] ``sattasuttasahassaani ^a^V1.0024^ea^, sattasuttasataani ca.
[22] dvaasa.t.thi ceva suttantaa, eso sa.myuttasa"ngaho''ti..
[03] katamo ^b^a"nguttaranikaayo?^eb^ ekekaa"ngaatirekavasena kathitaani cittapariyaadaanaadiini nava suttasahassaani pa~nca suttasataani sattapa~n~naasa~nca suttaani.
[21] ``nava suttasahassaani, pa~nca suttasataani ca.
[22] sattapa~n~naasa suttaani, sa"nkhyaa a"nguttare aya''nti..
[03] katamo ^b^khuddakanikaayo?^eb^ sakala.m vinayapi.taka.m, abhidhammapi.taka.m, khuddakapaa.thaadayo ca pubbe dassitaa pa~ncadasappabhedaa, .thapetvaa cattaaro nikaaye avasesa.m buddhavacana.m.
[21] ``.thapetvaa caturopete, nikaaye diighaaadike.
[22] tada~n~na.m buddhavacana.m, nikaayo khuddako mato''ti..
[03] eva.m nikaayavasena pa~ncavidha.m.

[03] katha.m a"ngavasena navavidha.m? sabbameva hida.m sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaathaa, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedallanti navappabheda.m hoti. tattha ubhatovibha"nganiddesakhandhakaparivaaraa, suttanipaate ma"ngalasuttaratanasuttanaalakasuttatuva.t.takasuttaani ca a~n~nampi ca suttanaamaka.m tathaagatavacana.m ^a^M1.0025^ea^ ^b^sutta^eb^nti veditabba.m. sabbampi sagaathaka.m sutta.m ^b^geyya^eb^nti ^a^P1.0024^ea^ veditabba.m. visesena sa.myuttake sakalopi sagaathavaggo, sakalampi abhidhammapi.taka.m, niggaathaka.m sutta.m, ya~nca a~n~nampi a.t.thahi a"ngehi asa"ngahita.m buddhavacana.m, ta.m ^b^veyyaakara.na^eb^nti veditabba.m. dhammapada.m, theragaathaa, theriigaathaa, suttanipaate nosuttanaamikaa suddhikagaathaa ca ^b^gaathaa^eb^ti veditabbaa. somanassa~n~naa.namayikagaathaa pa.tisa.myuttaa dveasiiti suttantaa ^b^udaana^eb^nti veditabba.m. ``vutta~nheta.m bhagavataa''tiaadinayappavattaa dasuttarasatasuttantaa ^b^itivuttaka^eb^nti veditabba.m. apa.n.nakajaatakaadiini pa~n~naasaadhikaani pa~ncajaatakasataani ^b^`jaataka'^eb^nti veditabba.m. ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa aanande''tiaadinayappavattaa (dii0 ni0 2.209) sabbepi acchariyabbhutadhammapa.tisa.myuttasuttantaa ^b^abbhutadhamma^eb^nti veditabba.m. cuu.lavedalla-mahaavedalla-sammaadi.t.thi-sakkapa~nha-sa"nkhaarabhaajaniya-mahaapu.n.namasuttaadayo ^a^V1.0025^ea^ sabbepi veda~nca tu.t.thi~nca laddhaa laddhaa pucchitasuttantaa ^b^vedalla^eb^nti veditabba.m. eva.m a"ngavasena navavidha.m.
[03] katha.m dhammakkhandhavasena caturaasiitisahassavidha.m? sabbameva ceta.m buddhavacana.m --
[21] ``dvaasiiti buddhato ga.nhi.m, dve sahassaani bhikkhuto.
[22] caturaasiiti sahassaani, ye me dhammaa pavattino''ti..

[03] eva.m paridiipitadhammakkhandhavasena caturaasiitisahassappabheda.m hoti. tattha ekaanusandhika.m sutta.m eko dhammakkhandho. ya.m anekaanusandhika.m, tattha anusandhivasena dhammakkhandhaga.nanaa. gaathaabandhesu pa~nhaapucchana.m eko dhammakkhandho, vissajjana.m eko. abhidhamme ekameka.m tikadukabhaajana.m, ekameka~nca cittavaarabhaajana.m, ekameko dhammakkhandho. vinaye atthi vatthu, atthi maatikaa, atthi padabhaajaniiya.m, atthi antaraapatti, atthi aapatti, atthi anaapatti, atthi tikacchedo. tattha ekameko ko.t.thaaso ekameko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbo. eva.m dhammakkhandhavasena caturaasiitisahassavidha.m.

[03] evameta.m abhedato rasavasena ekavidha.m, bhedato dhammavinayaadivasena ^a^P1.0025^ea^ duvidhaadibheda.m buddhavacana.m sa"ngaayantena mahaakassapappamukhena vasiiga.nena ``aya.m ^a^M1.0026^ea^ dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m pa.thamabuddhavacana.m, ida.m majjhimabuddhavacana.m, ida.m pacchimabuddhavacana.m, ida.m vinayapi.taka.m, ida.m suttantapi.taka.m, ida.m abhidhammapi.taka.m, aya.m diighanikaayo...pe0... aya.m khuddakanikaayo, imaani suttaadiini nava"ngaani, imaani caturaasiiti dhammakkhandhasahassaanii''ti, ima.m pabheda.m vavatthapetvaava sa"ngiita.m. na kevala~nca imameva, a~n~nampi uddaanasa"ngaha-vaggasa"ngaha-peyyaalasa"ngaha-ekakanipaata-dukanipaataadinipaatasa"ngaha-sa.myuttasa"ngaha-pa.n.naasasa"ngahaadi-anekavidha.m tiisu pi.takesu sandissamaana.m sa"ngahappabheda.m vavatthapetvaa eva sattahi maasehi sa"ngiita.m.

[03] sa"ngiitipariyosaane cassa -- ``ida.m mahaakassapattherena dasabalassa saasana.m pa~ncavassasahassaparimaa.nakaala.m pavattanasamattha.m kata''nti sa~njaatappamodaa saadhukaara.m viya dadamaanaa aya.m mahaapathavii udakapariyanta.m katvaa anekappakaara.m kampi sa"nkampi sampakampi sampavedhi, anekaani ca acchariyaani paaturahesunti, aya.m pa.thamamahaasa"ngiiti naama. yaa loke --
[21] ``satehi ^a^V1.0026^ea^ pa~ncahi kataa, tena pa~ncasataati ca.
[22] thereheva katattaa ca, therikaati pavuccatii''ti..

[03] imissaa ^a^P1.0026^ea^ ^a^V1.0027^ea^ ^a^M1.0027^ea^ pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitiyaa vattamaanaaya vinayasa"ngahaavasaane suttantapi.take aadinikaayassa aadisutta.m brahmajaala.m pucchantena aayasmataa mahaakassapena -- ``brahmajaala.m, aavuso aananda, kattha bhaasita''nti, evamaadivuttavacanapariyosaane yattha ca bhaasita.m, ya~ncaarabbha bhaasita.m, ta.m sabba.m pakaasento aayasmaa aanando eva.m me sutantiaadimaaha. tena vutta.m ``brahmajaalassaapi eva.m me sutantiaadika.m aayasmataa aanandena pa.thamamahaasa"ngiitikaale vutta.m nidaanamaadii''ti.

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^eva^eb^nti nipaatapada.m. ^b^me^eb^tiaadiini naamapadaani. ^b^pa.tipanno hotii^eb^ti ettha ^b^pa.tii^eb^ti upasaggapada.m, ^b^hotii^eb^ti aakhyaatapadanti. iminaa taava nayena padavibhaago veditabbo.

[03] atthato pana ^b^eva.m^eb^-saddo taava upamuupadesasampaha.msanagaraha.navacanasampa.tiggahaakaaranidassanaavadhaara.naadianekatthappabhedo. tathaahesa -- ``eva.m jaatena maccena, kattabba.m kusala.m bahu''nti (dha0 pa0 53) evamaadiisu upamaaya.m aagato. ``eva.m te abhikkamitabba.m, eva.m te pa.tikkamitabba''ntiaadiisu (a0 ni0 4.122) upadese. ``evameta.m bhagavaa, evameta.m sugataa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 3.66) sampaha.msane. ``evameva.m panaaya.m vasalii yasmi.m vaa tasmi.m vaa tassa mu.n.dakassa ^a^P1.0027^ea^ sama.nakassa va.n.na.m bhaasatii''tiaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 1.187) garaha.ne. ``eva.m, bhanteti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu''ntiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.1) vacanasampa.tiggahe. ``eva.m byaa kho aha.m, bhante, bhagavataa dhamma.m desita.m aajaanaamii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.398) aakaare. ``ehi tva.m, maa.navaka, yena sama.no aanando tenupasa"nkama, upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena sama.na.m aananda.m appaabaadha.m ^a^V1.0028^ea^ appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m puccha. ``subho maa.navo todeyyaputto bhavanta.m aananda.m appaabaadha.m appaata"nka.m lahu.t.thaana.m bala.m phaasuvihaara.m pucchatii''ti. ``eva~nca vadehi, saadhu kira bhava.m aanando yena subhassa ^a^M1.0028^ea^ maa.navassa todeyyaputtassa nivesana.m, tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa''tiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.445) nidassane. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~natha, kaalaamaa, ime dhammaa kusalaa vaa akusalaa vaati? akusalaa, bhante. saavajjaa vaa anavajjaa vaati? saavajjaa, bhante. vi~n~nugarahitaa vaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa vaati? vi~n~nugarahitaa, bhante. samattaa samaadinnaa ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti no vaa, katha.m vo ettha hotiiti? samattaa, bhante, samaadinnaa ahitaaya dukkhaaya sa.mvattanti, eva.m no ettha hotii''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 3.66) avadhaara.ne. svaayamidha aakaaranidassanaavadhaara.nesu da.t.thabbo.

[03] tattha aakaaratthena ^b^eva.m^eb^-saddena etamattha.m diipeti, naanaanayanipu.namanekajjhaasayasamu.t.thaana.m, atthabya~njanasampanna.m, vividhapaa.tihaariya.m, dhammatthadesanaapa.tivedhagambhiira.m, sabbasattaana.m sakasakabhaasaanuruupato sotapathamaagacchanta.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m sabbappakaarena ko samattho vi~n~naatu.m, sabbathaamena pana sotukaamata.m janetvaapi `eva.m me suta.m' mayaapi ekenaakaarena sutanti.
[03] nidassanatthena -- ``naaha.m sayambhuu, na mayaa ida.m sacchikata''nti attaana.m parimocento -- `eva.m me suta.m', `mayaapi eva.m suta'nti idaani vattabba.m sakala.m sutta.m nidasseti.

[03] avadhaara.natthena -- ``etadagga.m, bhikkhave, mama saavakaana.m bhikkhuuna.m bahussutaana.m yadida.m aanando, gatimantaana.m, satimantaana.m, dhitimantaana.m, upa.t.thaakaana.m yadida.m ^a^P1.0028^ea^ aanando''ti (a0 ni0 1.223). eva.m bhagavataa -- ``aayasmaa aanando atthakusalo, dhammakusalo, bya~njanakusalo, niruttikusalo, pubbaaparakusalo''ti (a0 ni0 5.169). eva.m dhammasenaapatinaa ca pasatthabhaavaanuruupa.m attano dhaara.nabala.m dassento sattaana.m sotukaamata.m janeti -- `eva.m me suta.m', ta~nca kho atthato vaa bya~njanato vaa anuunamanadhika.m, evameva na a~n~nathaa da.t.thabba''nti.

[03] ^b^me^eb^-saddo tiisu atthesu dissati. tathaa hissa -- ``gaathaabhigiita.m me abhojaneyya''ntiaadiisu (su0 ni0 81) mayaati attho. ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa"nkhittena dhamma.m desetuu''tiaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 4.88) mayhanti attho. ``dhammadaayaadaa me, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0029^ea^ ^a^M1.0029^ea^, bhavathaa''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.29) mamaati attho. idha pana mayaa sutanti ca, mama sutanti ca atthadvaye yujjati.

[03] ^b^suta^eb^nti aya.m ^b^suta^eb^-saddo saupasaggo ca anupasaggo ca -- gamanavissutakilinna-upacitaanuyoga-sotavi~n~neyya-sotadvaaraanusaara-vi~n~naataadianekatthappabhedo, tathaa hissa ``senaaya pasuto''tiaadiisu gacchantoti attho. ``sutadhammassa passato''tiaadiisu (udaa0 11) vissutadhammassaati attho. ``avassutaa avassutassaa''tiaadiisu (paaci0 657) kilinnaakilinnassaati attho. ``tumhehi pu~n~na.m pasuta.m anappaka''ntiaadiisu (khu0 paa0 7.12) upacitanti attho. ``ye jhaanapasutaa dhiiraa''tiaadiisu (dha0 pa0 181) jhaanaanuyuttaati attho. `di.t.tha.m suta.m muta'ntiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.241) sotavi~n~neyyanti attho. ``sutadharo sutasannicayo''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.339) sotadvaaraanusaaravi~n~naatadharoti attho. idha panassa sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaaritanti vaa upadhaara.nanti vaati attho. `me' saddassa hi `mayaa'ti atthe sati `eva.m mayaa suta.m' sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaaritanti yujjati. `mamaa'ti atthe sati eva.m mama suta.m sotadvaaraanusaarena upadhaara.nanti yujjati.

[03] evametesu tiisu padesu ^b^eva^eb^nti sotavi~n~naa.naadivi~n~naa.nakiccanidassana.m. ^b^me^eb^ti vuttavi~n~naa.nasama"ngipuggalanidassana.m. ^b^suta^eb^nti assavanabhaavapa.tikkhepato anuunaadhikaavipariitaggaha.nanidassana.m. tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti tassaa sotadvaaraanusaarena pavattaaya vi~n~naa.naviithiyaa naanappakaarena aaramma.ne pavattibhaavappakaasana.m. ^b^me^eb^ti attappakaasana.m. ^b^suta^eb^nti dhammappakaasana.m. aya~nhettha sa"nkhepo ^a^P1.0029^ea^ -- ``naanappakaarena aaramma.ne pavattaaya vi~n~naa.naviithiyaa mayaa na a~n~na.m kata.m, ida.m pana kata.m, aya.m dhammo suto''ti.

[03] tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti niddisitabbadhammappakaasana.m. ^b^me^eb^ti puggalappakaasana.m. ^b^suta^eb^nti puggalakiccappakaasana.m. ida.m vutta.m hoti. ``ya.m sutta.m niddisissaami, ta.m mayaa eva.m suta''nti.

[03] tathaa ^b^eva^eb^nti yassa cittasantaanassa naanaakaarappavattiyaa naanatthabya~njanaggaha.na.m hoti, tassa naanaakaaraniddeso. ^b^eva^eb^nti hi ayamaakaarapa~n~natti. ^b^me^eb^ti kattuniddeso. ^b^suta^eb^nti visayaniddeso. ettaavataa naanaakaarappavattena ^a^M1.0030^ea^ cittasantaanena ta.m sama"ngino kattu visayaggaha.nasanni.t.thaana.m kata.m hoti.

[03] athavaa ^a^V1.0030^ea^ ^b^eva^eb^nti puggalakiccaniddeso. ^b^suta^eb^nti vi~n~naa.nakiccaniddeso. ^b^me^eb^ti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso. aya.m panettha sa"nkhepo, ``mayaa savanakiccavi~n~naa.nasama"nginaa puggalena vi~n~naa.navasena laddhasavanakiccavohaarena suta''nti.

[03] tattha evanti ca meti ca saccika.t.thaparamatthavasena avijjamaanapa~n~natti. ki~nhettha ta.m paramatthato atthi, ya.m ^b^eva^eb^nti vaa meti vaa niddesa.m labhetha? sutanti vijjamaanapa~n~natti. ya~nhi ta.m ettha sotena upaladdha.m, ta.m paramatthato vijjamaananti. tathaa `eva'nti ca, meti ca, ta.m ta.m upaadaaya vattabbato upaadaapa~n~natti. `suta'nti di.t.thaadiini upanidhaaya vattabbato upanidhaapa~n~natti. ettha ca evanti vacanena asammoha.m diipeti. na hi sammuu.lho naanappakaarapa.tivedhasamattho hoti. `suta'nti vacanena sutassa asammosa.m diipeti. yassa hi suta.m sammu.t.tha.m hoti, na so kaalantarena mayaa sutanti pa.tijaanaati. iccassa asammohena pa~n~naasiddhi, asammosena pana satisiddhi. tattha pa~n~naapubba"ngamaaya satiyaa bya~njanaavadhaara.nasamatthataa, satipubba"ngamaaya pa~n~naaya atthapa.tivedhasamatthataa. tadubhayasamatthataayogena atthabya~njanasampannassa dhammakosassa anupaalanasamatthato dhammabha.n.daagaarikattasiddhi.

[03] aparo nayo, evanti vacanena yoniso manasikaara.m diipeti. ayoniso manasikaroto hi naanappakaarapa.tivedhaabhaavato. sutanti vacanena avikkhepa.m diipeti, vikkhittacittassa savanaabhaavato. tathaa hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyaa vuccamaanopi ^a^P1.0030^ea^ ``na mayaa suta.m, puna bha.nathaa''ti bha.nati. yoniso manasikaarena cettha attasammaapa.nidhi.m pubbe ca katapu~n~nata.m saadheti, sammaa appa.nihitattassa pubbe akatapu~n~nassa vaa tadabhaavato. avikkhepena saddhammassavana.m sappurisuupanissaya~nca saadheti. na hi vikkhittacitto sotu.m sakkoti, na ca sappurise anupassayamaanassa savana.m atthiiti.

[03] aparo ^a^M1.0031^ea^ nayo, yasmaa evanti yassa cittasantaanassa naanaakaarappavattiyaa naanatthabya~njanaggaha.na.m hoti, tassa naanaakaaraniddesoti vutta.m, so ca eva.m bhaddako aakaaro na sammaaappa.nihitattano pubbe akatapu~n~nassa vaa hoti, tasmaa evanti iminaa bhaddakenaakaarena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano diipeti. sutanti savanayogena purimacakkadvayasampatti.m. na hi appatiruupadese vasato sappurisuupanissayavirahitassa vaa savana.m atthi. iccassa pacchimacakkadvayasiddhiyaa aasayasuddhisiddhaa hoti, purimacakkadvayasiddhiyaa payogasuddhi, taaya ca aasayasuddhiyaa adhigamabyattisiddhi, payogasuddhiyaa aagamabyattisiddhi. iti ^a^V1.0031^ea^ payogaasayasuddhassa aagamaadhigamasampannassa vacana.m aru.nugga.m viya suuriyassa udayato yoniso manasikaaro viya ca kusalakammassa arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubba"ngama.m bhavitunti .thaane nidaana.m .thapento -- ``eva.m me suta''ntiaadimaaha.

[03] aparo nayo, `eva'nti iminaa naanappakaarapa.tivedhadiipakena vacanena attano atthapa.tibhaanapa.tisambhidaasampattisabbhaava.m diipeti. `suta'nti iminaa sotabbappabhedapa.tivedhadiipakena dhammaniruttipa.tisambhidaasampattisabbhaava.m. `eva'nti ca ida.m yoniso manasikaaradiipaka.m vacana.m bhaasamaano -- ``ete mayaa dhammaa manasaanupekkhitaa, di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa''ti diipeti. `suta'nti ida.m savanayogadiipaka.m vacana.m bhaasamaano -- ``bahuu mayaa dhammaa sutaa dhaataa vacasaa paricitaa''ti diipeti. tadubhayenaapi atthabya~njanapaaripuuri.m diipento savane aadara.m janeti. atthabya~njanaparipu.n.na~nhi dhamma.m aadarena assu.nanto mahataa hitaa paribaahiro hotiiti, tasmaa aadara.m janetvaa sakkacca.m aya.m dhammo sotabboti.

[03] ``eva.m ^a^P1.0031^ea^ me suta''nti iminaa pana sakalena vacanena aayasmaa aanando tathaagatappavedita.m dhamma.m attano adahanto asappurisabhuumi.m atikkamati. saavakatta.m pa.tijaananto sappurisabhuumi.m okkamati. tathaa asaddhammaa citta.m vu.t.thaapeti, saddhamme citta.m pati.t.thaapeti. ``kevala.m sutameveta.m mayaa, tasseva bhagavato vacana''nti diipento attaana.m parimoceti, satthaara.m apadisati, jinavacana.m appeti, dhammanetti.m pati.t.thaapeti.

[03] apica ^a^M1.0032^ea^ ``eva.m me suta''nti attanaa uppaaditabhaava.m appa.tijaananto purimavacana.m vivaranto -- ``sammukhaa pa.tiggahitamida.m mayaa tassa bhagavato catuvesaarajjavisaaradassa dasabaladharassa aasabha.t.thaana.t.thaayino siihanaadanaadino sabbasattuttamassa dhammissarassa dhammaraajassa dhammaadhipatino dhammadiipassa dhammasara.nassa saddhammavaracakkavattino sammaasambuddhassa vacana.m, na ettha atthe vaa dhamme vaa pade vaa bya~njane vaa ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa kaatabbaa''ti sabbesa.m devamanussaana.m imasmi.m dhamme assaddhiya.m vinaaseti, saddhaasampada.m uppaadeti. teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``vinaasayati assaddha.m, saddha.m va.d.dheti saasane.
[22] eva.m me sutamicceva.m, vada.m gotamasaavako''ti..
[03] ^b^eka^eb^nti ^a^V1.0032^ea^ ga.nanaparicchedaniddeso. ^b^samaya^eb^nti paricchinnaniddeso. ^b^eka.m samaya^eb^nti aniyamitaparidiipana.m. tattha ^b^samaya^eb^saddo --
[21] ``samavaaye kha.ne kaale, samuuhe hetudi.t.thisu.
[22] pa.tilaabhe pahaane ca, pa.tivedhe ca dissati''..

[03] tathaa hissa -- ``appevanaama svepi upasa"nkameyyaama kaala~nca samaya~nca upaadaayaa''ti evamaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.447) samavaayo attho. ``ekova kho bhikkhave, kha.no ca samayo ca brahmacariyavaasaayaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 8.29) kha.no. ``u.nhasamayo pari.laahasamayo''tiaadiisu (paaci0 358) kaalo. ``mahaasamayo pavanasmi''ntiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 2.332) samuuho. ``samayopi kho te, bhaddaali, appa.tividdho ahosi, bhagavaa kho ^a^P1.0032^ea^ saavatthiya.m viharati, bhagavaapi ma.m jaanissati, bhaddaali naama bhikkhu satthusaasane sikkhaaya aparipuurakaarii'ti. ayampi kho, te bhaddaali, samayo appa.tividdho ahosii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.135) hetu. ``tena kho pana samayena uggahamaano paribbaajako sama.namu.n.dikaaputto samayappavaadake tindukaaciire ekasaalake mallikaaya aaraame pa.tivasatii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.260) di.t.thi.
[21] ``di.t.the dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparaayiko.
[22] atthaabhisamayaa dhiiro, pa.n.ditoti pavuccatii''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.128) --

[07] aadiisu ^a^M1.0033^ea^ pa.tilaabho. ``sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 7.9) pahaana.m. ``dukkhassa pii.lana.t.tho sa"nkhata.t.tho santaapa.t.tho vipari.naama.t.tho abhisamaya.t.tho''tiaadiisu (pa.ti0 108) pa.tivedho. idha panassa kaalo attho. tena sa.mvaccharautumaasa.d.dhamaasarattidivapubba.nhamajjhanhikasaayanhapa.thamamajjhi-mapacchimayaamamuhuttaadiisu kaalappabhedabhuutesu samayesu eka.m samayanti diipeti.

[03] tattha ki~ncaapi etesu sa.mvaccharaadiisu samayesu ya.m ya.m sutta.m yasmi.m yasmi.m sa.mvacchare utumhi maase pakkhe rattibhaage vaa divasabhaage vaa vutta.m, sabba.m ta.m therassa suvidita.m suvavatthaapita.m pa~n~naaya. yasmaa pana -- ``eva.m me suta.m'' asukasa.mvacchare asukautumhi asukamaase asukapakkhe asukarattibhaage asukadivasabhaage vaati eva.m vutte na sakkaa sukhena ^a^V1.0033^ea^ dhaaretu.m vaa uddisitu.m vaa uddisaapetu.m vaa, bahu ca vattabba.m hoti, tasmaa ekeneva padena tamattha.m samodhaanetvaa ``eka.m samaya''nti aaha. ye vaa ime gabbhokkantisamayo, jaatisamayo, sa.mvegasamayo, abhinikkhamanasamayo, dukkarakaarikasamayo, maaravijayasamayo, abhisambodhisamayo di.t.thadhammasukhavihaarasamayo, desanaasamayo, parinibbaanasamayoti, evamaadayo bhagavato devamanussesu ativiya pakaasaa anekakaalappabhedaa eva samayaa. tesu samayesu desanaasamayasa"nkhaata.m eka.m samayanti diipeti. yo caaya.m ~naa.nakaru.naakiccasamayesu karu.naakiccasamayo, attahitaparahitapa.tipattisamayesu parahitapa.tipattisamayo, sannipatitaana.m kara.niiyadvayasamayesu dhammikathaasamayo desanaapa.tipattisamayesu ^a^P1.0033^ea^ desanaasamayo, tesupi samayesu a~n~natara.m samaya.m sandhaaya ^b^``eka.m samaya''^eb^nti aaha.

[03] kasmaa panettha yathaa abhidhamme ``yasmi.m samaye kaamaavacara''nti (dha0 sa0 1) ca, ito a~n~nesu ca suttapadesu -- ``yasmi.m samaye, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehii''ti ca bhummavacananiddeso kato, vinaye ca -- ``tena samayena buddho bhagavaa''ti kara.navacanena, tathaa akatvaa ``eka.m samaya''nti upayogavacananiddeso katoti? tattha tathaa idha ca a~n~nathaa atthasambhavato. tattha hi abhidhamme ito a~n~nesu suttapadesu ca adhikara.nattho ^a^M1.0034^ea^ bhaavena bhaavalakkha.nattho ca sambhavati. adhikara.na~nhi kaalattho, samuuhattho ca samayo, tattha tattha vuttaana.m phassaadidhammaana.m kha.nasamavaayahetusa"nkhaatassa ca samayassa bhaavena tesa.m bhaavo lakkhiiyati, tasmaa tadatthajotanattha.m tattha bhummavacananiddeso kato.

[03] vinaye ca hetuattho kara.nattho ca sambhavati. yo hi so sikkhaapadapa~n~nattisamayo saariputtaadiihipi dubbi~n~neyyo, tena samayena hetubhuutena kara.nabhuutena ca sikkhaapadaani pa~n~naapayanto sikkhaapadapa~n~nattihetu~nca apekkhamaano bhagavaa tattha tattha vihaasi, tasmaa tadatthajotanattha.m tattha kara.navacanena niddeso kato.

[03] idha pana a~n~nasmi~nca eva.m jaatike accantasa.myogattho sambhavati. ya~nhi samaya.m bhagavaa ima.m a~n~na.m vaa suttanta.m desesi, accantameva ta.m samaya.m karu.naavihaarena vihaasi, tasmaa tadatthajotanattha.m idha upayogavacananiddeso katoti.
[03] teneta.m vuccati --
[21] ``ta.m ^a^V1.0034^ea^ ta.m atthamapekkhitvaa, bhummena kara.nena ca.
[22] a~n~natra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhaa''ti..

[03] poraa.naa pana va.n.nayanti -- ``tasmi.m samaye''ti vaa, ``tena samayenaa''ti vaa, ``eka.m samaya''nti vaa, abhilaapamattabhedo esa, sabbattha bhummamevatthoti. tasmaa ``eka.m samaya''nti vuttepi ``ekasmi.m samaye''ti attho veditabbo.
[03] ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ti garu. garu~nhi loke bhagavaati vadanti. aya~nca ^a^P1.0034^ea^ sabbagu.navisi.t.thataaya sabbasattaana.m garu, tasmaa bhagavaati veditabbo. poraa.nehipi vutta.m --
[21] ``bhagavaati vacana.m se.t.tha.m, bhagavaati vacanamuttama.m.
[22] garu gaaravayutto so, bhagavaa tena vuccatii''ti..
[03] api ca --
[21] ``bhaagyavaa bhaggavaa yutto, bhagehi ca vibhattavaa.
[22] bhattavaa vantagamano, bhavesu bhagavaa tato''ti..
[03] imissaa ^a^M1.0035^ea^ gaathaaya vasenassa padassa vitthaaraattho veditabbo. so ca visuddhimagge buddhaanussatiniddese vuttoyeva.

[03] ettaavataa cettha ^b^eva.m me suta^eb^nti vacanena yathaasuta.m dhamma.m dassento bhagavato dhammakaaya.m paccakkha.m karoti. tena ``nayida.m atikkantasatthuka.m paavacana.m, aya.m vo satthaa''ti satthu adassanena ukka.n.thita.m jana.m samassaaseti.

[03] ^b^eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa^eb^ti vacanena tasmi.m samaye bhagavato avijjamaanabhaava.m dassento ruupakaayaparinibbaana.m saadheti. tena ``eva.mvidhassa naama ariyadhammassa desako dasabaladharo vajirasa"nghaata samaanakaayo sopi bhagavaa parinibbuto, kena a~n~nena jiivite aasaa janetabbaa''ti jiivitamadamatta.m jana.m sa.mvejeti, saddhamme cassa ussaaha.m janeti.
[03] ^b^eva^eb^nti ^a^V1.0035^ea^ ca bha.nanto desanaasampatti.m niddisati. ^b^me suta^eb^nti saavakasampatti.m. ^b^eka.m samaya^eb^nti kaalasampatti.m. ^b^bhagavaa^eb^ti desakasampatti.m.

[03] ^b^antaraa ca raajagaha.m antaraa ca naa.landa^eb^nti ^b^antaraa^eb^-saddo kaara.nakha.nacittavemajjhavivaraadiisu dissati. ``tadantara.m ko jaaneyya a~n~natra tathaagataa''ti (a0 ni0 6.44) ca, ``janaa sa"ngamma mantenti ma~nca ta~nca kimantara''nti (sa.m0 ni0 1.228) ca aadiisu hi kaara.ne antaraa-saddo. ``addasa ma.m, bhante, a~n~nataraa itthii vijjantarikaaya bhaajana.m dhovantii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.149) kha.ne. ``yassantarato na santi kopaa''tiaadiisu (udaa0 20) citte. ``antaraa vosaanamaapaadii''tiaadiisu ^a^P1.0035^ea^ (cuu.lava0 350) vemajjhe. ``api caaya.m, bhikkhave, tapodaa dvinna.m mahaanirayaana.m antarikaaya aagacchatii''tiaadiisu (paaraa0 231) vivare. svaayamidha vivare vattati, tasmaa raajagahassa ca naa.landaaya ca vivareti evametthattho veditabbo. antaraa-saddena pana yuttattaa upayogavacana.m kata.m. iidisesu ca .thaanesu akkharacintakaa ``antaraa gaama~nca nadi~nca yaatii''ti eva.m ekameva antaraasadda.m payujjanti, so dutiyapadenapi yojetabbo hoti, ayojiyamaane upayogavacana.m na paapu.naati. idha pana yojetvaayeva vuttoti.

[03] ^b^addhaanamaggappa.tipanno^eb^ ^a^M1.0036^ea^ ^b^hotii^eb^ti addhaanasa"nkhaata.m magga.m pa.tipanno hoti, ``diighamagga''nti attho. addhaanagamanasamayassa hi vibha"nge ``a.d.dhayojana.m gacchissaamiiti bhu~njitabba''ntiaadivacanato (paaci0 218) a.d.dhayojanampi addhaanamaggo hoti. raajagahato pana naa.landaa yojanameva.

[03] ^b^mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi^eb^nti `mahataa'ti gu.namahattenapi mahataa, sa"nkhyaamahattenapi mahataa. so hi bhikkhusa"ngho gu.nehipi mahaa ahosi, appicchataadigu.nasamannaagatattaa. sa"nkhyaayapi mahaa, pa~ncasatasa"nkhyattaa. bhikkhuuna.m sa"ngho `bhikkhusa"ngho', tena bhikkhusa"nghena. di.t.thisiilasaama~n~nasa"nghaatasa"nkhaatena sama.naga.nenaati attho. ^b^saddhi^eb^nti ekato.

[03] ^b^pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehii^eb^ti pa~ncamattaa etesanti pa~ncamattaani. mattaati pamaa.na.m vuccati, tasmaa yathaa ``bhojane matta~n~nuu''ti vutte ``bhojane matta.m jaanaati, pamaa.na.m jaanaatii''ti attho hoti, evamidhaapi -- ``tesa.m bhikkhusataana.m pa~ncamattaa pa~ncapamaa.na''nti evamattho da.t.thabbo. bhikkhuuna.m sataani bhikkhusataani, tehi pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi.

[03] ^b^suppiyopi^eb^ ^a^V1.0036^ea^ ^b^kho paribbaajako^eb^ti ^b^suppiyo^eb^ti tassa naama.m. ^b^pi^eb^-kaaro maggappa.tipannasabhaagataaya puggalasampi.n.danattho. ^b^kho^eb^-kaaro padasandhikaro, bya~njanasili.t.thataavasena vutto. ^b^paribbaajako^eb^ti sa~njayassa antevaasii channaparibbaajako. ida.m vutta.m hoti -- ``yadaa bhagavaa ta.m addhaanamagga.m ^a^P1.0036^ea^ pa.tipanno, tadaa suppiyopi paribbaajako pa.tipanno ahosii''ti. atiitakaalattho hettha hoti-saddo.

[03] ^b^saddhi.m antevaasinaa brahmadattena maa.navenaa^eb^ti -- ettha ante vasatiiti antevaasii. samiipacaaro santikaavacaro sissoti attho. ^b^brahmadatto^eb^ti tassa naama.m. ^b^maa.navo^eb^ti sattopi coropi taru.nopi vuccati.
[21] ``coditaa devaduutehi, ye pamajjanti maa.navaa.
[22] te diigharatta.m socanti, hiinakaayuupagaa naraa''ti.. (ma0 ni0 3.271) --

[07] aadiisu ^a^M1.0037^ea^ hi satto maa.navoti vutto. ``maa.navehipi samaagacchanti katakammehipi akatakammehipii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.149) coro. ``amba.t.tho maa.navo, a"ngako maa.navo''tiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.316) taru.no `maa.navo'ti vutto. idhaapi ayamevattho. ida~nhi vutta.m hoti -- brahmadattena naama taru.nantevaasinaa saddhinti.

[03] ^b^tatraa^eb^ti tasmi.m addhaanamagge, tesu vaa dviisu janesu. ^b^suda^eb^nti nipaatamatta.m. ^b^anekapariyaayenaa^eb^ti pariyaaya-saddo taava vaaradesanaakaara.nesu vattati. ``kassa nu kho, aananda, ajja pariyaayo bhikkhuniyo ovaditu''ntiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 3.398) hi vaare pariyaayasaddo vattati. ``madhupi.n.dikapariyaayotveva na.m dhaarehii''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 1.205) desanaaya.m. ``iminaapi kho, te raaja~n~na, pariyaayena eva.m hotuu''tiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 2.411) kaara.ne. svaayamidhaapi kaara.ne vattati, tasmaa ayamettha attho -- ``anekavidhena kaara.nenaa''ti, ``bahuuhi kaara.nehii''ti vutta.m hoti.

[03] ^b^buddhassa ava.n.na.m bhaasatii^eb^ti ava.n.navirahitassa aparimaa.nava.n.nasamannaagatassaapi buddhassa bhagavato -- ``ya.m loke jaativu.d.dhesu kattabba.m abhivaadanaadisaamiicikamma.m `saamaggiraso'ti vuccati, ta.m sama.nassa gotamassa natthi tasmaa arasaruupo sama.no gotamo, nibbhogo, akiriyavaado, ucchedavaado, jegucchii, venayiko, tapassii, apagabbho. natthi sama.nassa gotamassa ^a^V1.0037^ea^ uttarimanussadhammo alamariya~naa.nadassanaviseso. takkapariyaahata.m sama.no gotamo dhamma.m deseti, viima.msaanucarita.m, saya.mpa.tibhaana.m. sama.no gotamo na sabba~n~nuu, na lokaviduu, na anuttaro, na aggapuggalo''ti. eva.m ta.m ta.m akaara.nameva kaara.nanti vatvaa ^a^P1.0037^ea^ tathaa tathaa ava.n.na.m dosa.m ninda.m bhaasati.

[03] yathaa ca buddhassa, eva.m dhammassaapi ta.m ta.m akaara.nameva kaara.nato vatvaa -- ``sama.nassa gotamassa dhammo durakkhaato, duppa.tivedito, aniyyaaniko, anupasamasa.mvattaniko''ti tathaa tathaa ava.n.na.m bhaasati.

[03] yathaa ^a^M1.0038^ea^ ca dhammassa, eva.m sa"nghassaapi ya.m vaa ta.m vaa akaara.nameva kaara.nato vatvaa -- ``micchaapa.tipanno sama.nassa gotamassa saavakasa"ngho, ku.tilapa.tipanno, paccaniikapa.tipada.m ananulomapa.tipada.m adhammaanulomapa.tipada.m pa.tipanno''ti tathaa tathaa ava.n.na.m bhaasati.

[03] antevaasii panassa -- ``amhaaka.m aacariyo aparaamasitabba.m paraamasati, anakkamitabba.m akkamati, svaaya.m aggi.m gilanto viya, hatthena asidhaara.m paraamasanto viya, mu.t.thinaa sineru.m padaaletukaamo viya, kakacadantapantiya.m kii.lamaano viya, pabhinnamada.m ca.n.dahatthi.m hatthena ga.nhanto viya ca va.n.naarahasseva ratanattayassa ava.n.na.m bhaasamaano anayabyasana.m paapu.nissati. aacariye kho pana guutha.m vaa aggi.m vaa ka.n.taka.m vaa ka.nhasappa.m vaa akkamante, suula.m vaa abhiruuhante, halaahala.m vaa visa.m khaadante, khaarodaka.m vaa pakkhalante, narakapapaata.m vaa papatante, na antevaasinaa ta.m sabbamanukaatabba.m hoti. kammassakaa hi sattaa attano kammaanuruupameva gati.m gacchanti. neva pitaa puttassa kammena gacchati, na putto pitu kammena, na maataa puttassa, na putto maatuyaa, na bhaataa bhaginiyaa, na bhaginii bhaatu, na aacariyo antevaasino, na antevaasii aacariyassa kammena gacchati. mayha~nca aacariyo ti.n.na.m ratanaana.m ava.n.na.m bhaasati, mahaasaavajjo kho panaariyuupavaadoti. eva.m yoniso ummujjitvaa aacariyavaada.m maddamaano sammaakaara.nameva kaara.nato apadisanto anekapariyaayena ti.n.na.m ratanaana.m va.n.na.m bhaasitumaaraddho, yathaa ta.m pa.n.ditajaatiko kulaputto''. tena vutta.m -- ``suppiyassa pana paribbaajakassa antevaasii brahmadatto maa.navo anekapariyaayena buddhassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, dhammassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, sa"nghassa va.n.na.m bhaasatii''ti.

[03] tattha ^b^va.n.na^eb^nti va.n.na-saddo sa.n.thaana-jaati-ruupaayatana-kaara.na-pamaa.na-gu.na-pasa.msaadiisu dissati ^a^V1.0038^ea^. tattha ``mahanta.m sapparaajava.n.na.m ^a^P1.0038^ea^ abhinimminitvaa''tiaadiisu (sa.m0 ni0 1.142) sa.n.thaana.m vuccati. ``braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiino a~n~no va.n.no''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.402) jaati. ``paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagato''tiaadiisu (dii0 ni0 1.303) ruupaayatana.m.
[21] ``na ^a^M1.0039^ea^ haraami na bha~njaami, aaraa si"nghaami vaarija.m.
[22] atha kena nu va.n.nena, gandhatthenoti vuccatii''ti.. (sa.m0 ni0 1.234) --

[07] aadiisu kaara.na.m. ``tayo pattassa va.n.naa''tiaadiisu (paaraa0 602) pamaa.na.m. ``kadaa sa~n~nuu.lhaa pana, te gahapati, ime sama.nassa gotamassa va.n.naa''tiaadiisu (ma0 ni0 2.77) gu.no. ``va.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasatii''tiaadiisu (a0 ni0 2.135) pasa.msaa. idha gu.nopi pasa.msaapi. aya.m kira ta.m ta.m bhuutameva kaara.na.m apadisanto anekapariyaayena ratanattayassa gu.nuupasa~nhita.m pasa.msa.m abhaasi. tattha -- ``itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho''tiaadinaa (paaraa0 1) nayena, ``ye bhikkhave, buddhe pasannaa agge te pasannaa''tiaadinaa ``ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamaano uppajjati...pe0... asamo asamasamo''tiaadinaa (a0 ni0 1.174) ca nayena buddhassa va.n.no veditabbo. ``svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo''ti (dii0 ni0 2.159) ca ``aalayasamugghaato va.t.tupacchedo''ti (iti0 90, a0 ni0 4.34) ca, ``ye bhikkhave, ariye a.t.tha"ngike magge pasannaa, agge te pasannaa''ti ca evamaadiihi nayehi dhammassa va.n.no veditabbo. ``suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho''ti (dii0 ni0 2.159) ca, ``ye, bhikkhave, sa"nghe pasannaa, agge te pasannaa''ti (a0 ni0 4.34) ca evamaadiihi pana nayehi sa"nghassa va.n.no veditabbo. pahontena pana dhammakathikena pa~ncanikaaye nava"nga.m satthusaasana.m caturaasiitidhammakkhandhasahassaani ogaahitvaa buddhaadiina.m va.n.no pakaasetabbo. imasmi~nhi .thaane buddhaadiina.m gu.ne pakaasento atitthena pakkhando dhammakathikoti na sakkaa vattu.m. iidisesu hi .thaanesu dhammakathikassa thaamo veditabbo. brahmadatto pana maa.navo anussavaadimattasambandhitena attano thaamena ratanattayassa va.n.na.m bhaasati.

[03] ^b^itiha te ubho aacariyantevaasii^eb^ti eva.m te dve aacariyantevaasikaa. ^b^a~n~nama~n~nassaa^eb^ti a~n~no a~n~nassa. ^b^ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa^eb^ti iisakampi apariharitvaa ujumeva vividhapaccaniikavaadaa, anekavaara.m viruddhavaadaa eva hutvaati ^a^P1.0039^ea^ attho. aacariyena hi ratanattayassa ^a^V1.0039^ea^ ava.n.ne bhaasite antevaasii va.n.na.m bhaasati, puna itaro ava.n.na.m, itaro va.n.nanti eva.m aacariyo saaraphalake visarukkhaaa.ni.m aako.tayamaano viya ^a^M1.0040^ea^ punappuna.m ratanattayassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati. antevaasii pana suva.n.narajatama.nimayaaya aa.niyaa ta.m aa.ni.m pa.tibaahayamaano viya punappuna.m ratanattayassa va.n.na.m bhaasati. tena vutta.m -- ``ujuvipaccaniikavaadaa''ti.

[03] ^b^bhagavanta.m pi.t.thito pi.t.thito anubandhaa honti bhikkhusa"ngha~ncaa^eb^ti bhagavanta~nca bhikkhusa"ngha~nca pacchato pacchato dassana.m avijahantaa iriyaapathaanubandhanena anubandhaa honti, siisaanulokino hutvaa anugataa hontiiti attho.

[03] kasmaa pana bhagavaa ta.m addhaana.m pa.tipanno? kasmaa ca suppiyo anubandho? kasmaa ca so ratanattayassa ava.n.na.m bhaasatiiti? bhagavaa taava tasmi.m kaale raajagahaparivattakesu a.t.thaarasasu mahaavihaaresu a~n~natarasmi.m vasitvaa paatova sariirappa.tijaggana.m katvaa bhikkhaacaaravelaaya.m bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto raajagahe pi.n.daaya carati. so ta.m divasa.m bhikkhusa"nghassa sulabhapi.n.dapaata.m katvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto bhikkhusa"ngha.m pattaciivara.m gaahaapetvaa -- ``naa.landa.m gamissaamii''ti, raajagahato nikkhamitvaa ta.m addhaana.m pa.tipanno. suppiyopi kho tasmi.m kaale raajagahaparivattake a~n~natarasmi.m paribbaajakaaraame vasitvaa paribbaajakaparivuto raajagahe bhikkhaaya carati. sopi ta.m divasa.m paribbaajakaparisaaya sulabhabhikkha.m katvaa bhuttapaataraaso paribbaajake paribbaajakaparikkhaara.m gaahaapetvaa -- naa.landa.m gamissaamicceva bhagavato ta.m magga.m pa.tipannabhaava.m ajaanantova anubandho. sace pana jaaneyya naanubandheyya. so ajaanitvaava gacchanto giiva.m ukkhipitvaa olokayamaano bhagavanta.m addasa buddhasiriyaa sobhamaana.m rattakambalaparikkhittamiva ja"ngamakanakagirisikhara.m.

[03] tasmi.m kira samaye dasabalassa sariirato nikkhamitvaa chabba.n.narasmiyo samantaa asiitihatthappamaa.ne padese aadhaavanti vidhaavanti ratanaave.laratanadaamaratanacu.n.navippaki.n.na.m ^a^P1.0040^ea^ viya, pasaaritaratanacittaka~ncanapa.tamiva, rattasuva.n.narasanisi~ncamaanamiva, ukkaasatanipaatasamaakulamiva, nirantaravippaki.n.naka.nikaarapupphamiva vaayuvegakkhittaciinapi.t.thacu.n.namiva, indadhanuvijjulataataaraaga.nappabhaavisaravipphuritaviccharitamiva ca ta.m vanantara.m hoti.
